00086 static void *arena_alloc(CCGAllocatorHDL a, int numBytes)
00087 {
00088     return BLI_memarena_alloc(a, numBytes);
00089 }
00090 
00091 static void *arena_realloc(CCGAllocatorHDL a, void *ptr, int newSize, int oldSize)
00092 {
00093     void *p2 = BLI_memarena_alloc(a, newSize);
00094     if (ptr) {
00095         memcpy(p2, ptr, oldSize);
00096     }
00097     return p2;
00098 }

00110 typedef enum {
00111     CCG_USE_AGING = 1,
00112     CCG_USE_ARENA = 2,
00113     CCG_CALC_NORMALS = 4
00114 } CCGFlags;
00115 
00116 static CCGSubSurf *_getSubSurf(CCGSubSurf *prevSS, int subdivLevels, CCGFlags flags)
00117 {
00118     CCGMeshIFC ifc;
00119     CCGSubSurf *ccgSS;
00120     int useAging = !!(flags & CCG_USE_AGING);
00121     int useArena = flags & CCG_USE_ARENA;
00122 
00123     /* subdivLevels==0 is not allowed */
00124     subdivLevels = MAX2(subdivLevels, 1);
00125 
00126     if (prevSS) {
00127         int oldUseAging;
00128 
00129         ccgSubSurf_getUseAgeCounts(prevSS, &oldUseAging, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00130 
00131         if (oldUseAging != useAging) {
00132             ccgSubSurf_free(prevSS);
00133         }
00134         else {
00135             ccgSubSurf_setSubdivisionLevels(prevSS, subdivLevels);
00136 
00137             return prevSS;
00138         }
00139     }
00140 
00141     if (useAging) {
00142         ifc.vertUserSize = ifc.edgeUserSize = ifc.faceUserSize = 12;
00143     }
00144     else {
00145         ifc.vertUserSize = ifc.edgeUserSize = ifc.faceUserSize = 8;
00146     }
00147     ifc.vertDataSize = sizeof(float) * (flags & CCG_CALC_NORMALS ? 6 : 3);
00148 
00149     if (useArena) {
00150         CCGAllocatorIFC allocatorIFC;
00151         CCGAllocatorHDL allocator = BLI_memarena_new((1 << 16), "subsurf arena");
00152 
00153         allocatorIFC.alloc = arena_alloc;
00154         allocatorIFC.realloc = arena_realloc;
00155         allocatorIFC.free = arena_free;
00156         allocatorIFC.release = arena_release;
00157 
00158         ccgSS = ccgSubSurf_new(&ifc, subdivLevels, &allocatorIFC, allocator);
00159     }
00160     else {
00161         ccgSS = ccgSubSurf_new(&ifc, subdivLevels, NULL, NULL);
00162     }
00163 
00164     if (useAging) {
00165         ccgSubSurf_setUseAgeCounts(ccgSS, 1, 8, 8, 8);
00166     }
00167 
00168     if (flags & CCG_CALC_NORMALS)
00169         ccgSubSurf_setCalcVertexNormals(ccgSS, 1, offsetof(DMGridData, no));
00170     else
00171         ccgSubSurf_setCalcVertexNormals(ccgSS, 0, 0);
00172 
00173     return ccgSS;
00174 }
00175 
00176 static int getEdgeIndex(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGEdge *e, int x, int edgeSize)
00177 {
00178     CCGVert *v0 = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert0(e);
00179     CCGVert *v1 = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert1(e);
00180     int v0idx = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v0));
00181     int v1idx = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v1));
00182     int edgeBase = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e));
00183 
00184     if (x == 0) {
00185         return v0idx;
00186     }
00187     else if (x == edgeSize - 1) {
00188         return v1idx;
00189     }
00190     else {
00191         return edgeBase + x - 1;
00192     }
00193 }
00194 
00195 static int getFaceIndex(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f, int S, int x, int y, int edgeSize, int gridSize)
00196 {
00197     int faceBase = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f));
00198     int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
00199 
00200     if (x == gridSize - 1 && y == gridSize - 1) {
00201         CCGVert *v = ccgSubSurf_getFaceVert(f, S);
00202         return *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v));
00203     }
00204     else if (x == gridSize - 1) {
00205         CCGVert *v = ccgSubSurf_getFaceVert(f, S);
00206         CCGEdge *e = ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(f, S);
00207         int edgeBase = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e));
00208         if (v == ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert0(e)) {
00209             return edgeBase + (gridSize - 1 - y) - 1;
00210         }
00211         else {
00212             return edgeBase + (edgeSize - 2 - 1) - ((gridSize - 1 - y) - 1);
00213         }
00214     }
00215     else if (y == gridSize - 1) {
00216         CCGVert *v = ccgSubSurf_getFaceVert(f, S);
00217         CCGEdge *e = ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(f, (S + numVerts - 1) % numVerts);
00218         int edgeBase = *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e));
00219         if (v == ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert0(e)) {
00220             return edgeBase + (gridSize - 1 - x) - 1;
00221         }
00222         else {
00223             return edgeBase + (edgeSize - 2 - 1) - ((gridSize - 1 - x) - 1);
00224         }
00225     }
00226     else if (x == 0 && y == 0) {
00227         return faceBase;
00228     }
00229     else if (x == 0) {
00230         S = (S + numVerts - 1) % numVerts;
00231         return faceBase + 1 + (gridSize - 2) * S + (y - 1);
00232     }
00233     else if (y == 0) {
00234         return faceBase + 1 + (gridSize - 2) * S + (x - 1);
00235     }
00236     else {
00237         return faceBase + 1 + (gridSize - 2) * numVerts + S * (gridSize - 2) * (gridSize - 2) + (y - 1) * (gridSize - 2) + (x - 1);
00238     }
00239 }

00241 static void get_face_uv_map_vert(UvVertMap *vmap, struct MPoly *mpoly, struct MLoop *ml, int fi, CCGVertHDL *fverts)
00242 {
00243     UvMapVert *v, *nv;
00244     int j, nverts = mpoly[fi].totloop;
00245 
00246     for (j = 0; j < nverts; j++) {
00247         for (nv = v = get_uv_map_vert(vmap, ml[j].v); v; v = v->next) {
00248             if (v->separate)
00249                 nv = v;
00250             if (v->f == fi)
00251                 break;
00252         }
00253 
00254         fverts[j] = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(mpoly[nv->f].loopstart + nv->tfindex);
00255     }
00256 }
00257 
00258 static int ss_sync_from_uv(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGSubSurf *origss, DerivedMesh *dm, MLoopUV *mloopuv)
00259 {
00260     MPoly *mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00261     MLoop *mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00262     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00263     int totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00264     int totface = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00265     int i, j, seam;
00266     UvMapVert *v;
00267     UvVertMap *vmap;
00268     float limit[2];
00269     CCGVertHDL *fverts = NULL;
00270     BLI_array_declare(fverts);
00271     EdgeHash *ehash;
00272     float creaseFactor = (float)ccgSubSurf_getSubdivisionLevels(ss);
00273     float uv[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}; /* only first 2 values are written into */
00274 
00275     limit[0] = limit[1] = STD_UV_CONNECT_LIMIT;
00276     vmap = make_uv_vert_map(mpoly, mloop, mloopuv, totface, totvert, 0, limit);
00277     if (!vmap)
00278         return 0;
00279     
00280     ccgSubSurf_initFullSync(ss);
00281 
00282     /* create vertices */
00283     for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++) {
00284         if (!get_uv_map_vert(vmap, i))
00285             continue;
00286 
00287         for (v = get_uv_map_vert(vmap, i)->next; v; v = v->next)
00288             if (v->separate)
00289                 break;
00290 
00291         seam = (v != NULL) || ((mvert + i)->flag & ME_VERT_MERGED);
00292 
00293         for (v = get_uv_map_vert(vmap, i); v; v = v->next) {
00294             if (v->separate) {
00295                 CCGVert *ssv;
00296                 int loopid = mpoly[v->f].loopstart + v->tfindex;
00297                 CCGVertHDL vhdl = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(loopid);
00298 
00299                 copy_v2_v2(uv, mloopuv[loopid].uv);
00300 
00301                 ccgSubSurf_syncVert(ss, vhdl, uv, seam, &ssv);
00302             }
00303         }
00304     }
00305 
00306     /* create edges */
00307     ehash = BLI_edgehash_new();
00308 
00309     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
00310         MPoly *mp = &((MPoly *) mpoly)[i];
00311         int nverts = mp->totloop;
00312         CCGFace *origf = ccgSubSurf_getFace(origss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00313         /* unsigned int *fv = &mp->v1; */
00314         MLoop *ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00315 
00316         BLI_array_empty(fverts);
00317         BLI_array_growitems(fverts, nverts);
00318 
00319         get_face_uv_map_vert(vmap, mpoly, ml, i, fverts);
00320 
00321         for (j = 0; j < nverts; j++) {
00322             int v0 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(fverts[j]);
00323             int v1 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(fverts[(j + 1) % nverts]);
00324             MVert *mv0 = mvert + (ml[j].v);
00325             MVert *mv1 = mvert + (ml[((j + 1) % nverts)].v);
00326 
00327             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(ehash, v0, v1)) {
00328                 CCGEdge *e, *orige = ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(origf, j);
00329                 CCGEdgeHDL ehdl = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(mp->loopstart + j);
00330                 float crease;
00331 
00332                 if ((mv0->flag & mv1->flag) & ME_VERT_MERGED)
00333                     crease = creaseFactor;
00334                 else
00335                     crease = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeCrease(orige);
00336 
00337                 ccgSubSurf_syncEdge(ss, ehdl, fverts[j], fverts[(j + 1) % nverts], crease, &e);
00338                 BLI_edgehash_insert(ehash, v0, v1, NULL);
00339             }
00340         }
00341     }
00342 
00343     BLI_edgehash_free(ehash, NULL);
00344 
00345     /* create faces */
00346     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
00347         MPoly *mp = &mpoly[i];
00348         MLoop *ml = &mloop[mp->loopstart];
00349         int nverts = mp->totloop;
00350         CCGFace *f;
00351 
00352         BLI_array_empty(fverts);
00353         BLI_array_growitems(fverts, nverts);
00354 
00355         get_face_uv_map_vert(vmap, mpoly, ml, i, fverts);
00356         ccgSubSurf_syncFace(ss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), nverts, fverts, &f);
00357     }
00358 
00359     BLI_array_free(fverts);
00360 
00361     free_uv_vert_map(vmap);
00362     ccgSubSurf_processSync(ss);
00363 
00364     return 1;
00365 }

00367 static void set_subsurf_uv(CCGSubSurf *ss, DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *result, int n)
00368 {
00369     CCGSubSurf *uvss;
00370     CCGFace **faceMap;
00371     MTFace *tf;
00372     MLoopUV *mluv;
00373     CCGFaceIterator *fi;
00374     int index, gridSize, gridFaces, /*edgeSize,*/ totface, x, y, S;
00375     MLoopUV *dmloopuv = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, n);
00376     /* need to update both CD_MTFACE & CD_MLOOPUV, hrmf, we could get away with
00377      * just tface except applying the modifier then looses subsurf UV */
00378     MTFace *tface = CustomData_get_layer_n(&result->faceData, CD_MTFACE, n);
00379     MLoopUV *mloopuv = CustomData_get_layer_n(&result->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, n);
00380 
00381     if (!dmloopuv || (!tface && !mloopuv))
00382         return;
00383 
00384     /* create a CCGSubSurf from uv's */
00385     uvss = _getSubSurf(NULL, ccgSubSurf_getSubdivisionLevels(ss), CCG_USE_ARENA);
00386 
00387     if (!ss_sync_from_uv(uvss, ss, dm, dmloopuv)) {
00388         ccgSubSurf_free(uvss);
00389         return;
00390     }
00391 
00392     /* get some info from CCGSubSurf */
00393     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(uvss);
00394     /* edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(uvss); */ /*UNUSED*/
00395     gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(uvss);
00396     gridFaces = gridSize - 1;
00397 
00398     /* make a map from original faces to CCGFaces */
00399     faceMap = MEM_mallocN(totface * sizeof(*faceMap), "facemapuv");
00400 
00401     fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(uvss);
00402     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
00403         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
00404         faceMap[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f))] = f;
00405     }
00406     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
00407 
00408     /* load coordinates from uvss into tface */
00409     tf = tface;
00410     mluv = mloopuv;
00411 
00412     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
00413         CCGFace *f = faceMap[index];
00414         int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
00415 
00416         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
00417             float (*faceGridData)[3] = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(uvss, f, S);
00418 
00419             for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
00420                 for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
00421                     float *a = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 0];
00422                     float *b = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 1];
00423                     float *c = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 1];
00424                     float *d = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 0];
00425 
00426                     if (tf) {
00427                         copy_v2_v2(tf->uv[0], a);
00428                         copy_v2_v2(tf->uv[1], d);
00429                         copy_v2_v2(tf->uv[2], c);
00430                         copy_v2_v2(tf->uv[3], b);
00431                         tf++;
00432                     }
00433 
00434                     if (mluv) {
00435                         copy_v2_v2(mluv[0].uv, a);
00436                         copy_v2_v2(mluv[1].uv, d);
00437                         copy_v2_v2(mluv[2].uv, c);
00438                         copy_v2_v2(mluv[3].uv, b);
00439                         mluv += 4;
00440                     }
00441 
00442                 }
00443             }
00444         }
00445     }
00446 
00447     ccgSubSurf_free(uvss);
00448     MEM_freeN(faceMap);
00449 }
00450 
00451 /* face weighting */
00452 typedef struct FaceVertWeightEntry {
00453     FaceVertWeight *weight;
00454     float *w;
00455     int valid;
00456 } FaceVertWeightEntry;
00457 
00458 typedef struct WeightTable {
00459     FaceVertWeightEntry *weight_table;
00460     int len;
00461 } WeightTable;
00462 
00463 static float *get_ss_weights(WeightTable *wtable, int gridCuts, int faceLen)
00464 {
00465     int x, y, i, j;
00466     float *w, w1, w2, w4, fac, fac2, fx, fy;
00467 
00468     if (wtable->len <= faceLen) {
00469         void *tmp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FaceVertWeightEntry) * (faceLen + 1), "weight table alloc 2");
00470         
00471         if (wtable->len) {
00472             memcpy(tmp, wtable->weight_table, sizeof(FaceVertWeightEntry) * wtable->len);
00473             MEM_freeN(wtable->weight_table);
00474         }
00475         
00476         wtable->weight_table = tmp;
00477         wtable->len = faceLen + 1;
00478     }
00479 
00480     if (!wtable->weight_table[faceLen].valid) {
00481         wtable->weight_table[faceLen].valid = 1;
00482         wtable->weight_table[faceLen].w = w = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * faceLen * faceLen * (gridCuts + 2) * (gridCuts + 2), "weight table alloc");
00483         fac = 1.0f / (float)faceLen;
00484 
00485         for (i = 0; i < faceLen; i++) {
00486             for (x = 0; x < gridCuts + 2; x++) {
00487                 for (y = 0; y < gridCuts + 2; y++) {
00488                     fx = 0.5f - (float)x / (float)(gridCuts + 1) / 2.0f;
00489                     fy = 0.5f - (float)y / (float)(gridCuts + 1) / 2.0f;
00490                 
00491                     fac2 = faceLen - 4;
00492                     w1 = (1.0f - fx) * (1.0f - fy) + (-fac2 * fx * fy * fac);
00493                     w2 = (1.0f - fx + fac2 * fx * -fac) * (fy);
00494                     w4 = (fx) * (1.0f - fy + -fac2 * fy * fac);
00495 
00496                     fac2 = 1.0f - (w1 + w2 + w4);
00497                     fac2 = fac2 / (float)(faceLen - 3);
00498                     for (j = 0; j < faceLen; j++)
00499                         w[j] = fac2;
00500                     
00501                     w[i] = w1;
00502                     w[(i - 1 + faceLen) % faceLen] = w2;
00503                     w[(i + 1) % faceLen] = w4;
00504 
00505                     w += faceLen;
00506                 }
00507             }
00508         }
00509     }
00510 
00511     return wtable->weight_table[faceLen].w;
00512 }
00513 
00514 static void free_ss_weights(WeightTable *wtable)
00515 {
00516     int i;
00517 
00518     for (i = 0; i < wtable->len; i++) {
00519         if (wtable->weight_table[i].valid)
00520             MEM_freeN(wtable->weight_table[i].w);
00521     }
00522     
00523     if (wtable->weight_table)
00524         MEM_freeN(wtable->weight_table);
00525 }
00526 
00527 static void ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(CCGSubSurf *ss, DerivedMesh *dm,
00528                                      float (*vertexCos)[3], int useFlatSubdiv)
00529 {
00530     float creaseFactor = (float) ccgSubSurf_getSubdivisionLevels(ss);
00531     CCGVertHDL *fVerts = NULL;
00532     BLI_array_declare(fVerts);
00533     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00534     MEdge *medge = dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
00535     /* MFace *mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm); */ /* UNUSED */
00536     MVert *mv;
00537     MEdge *me;
00538     MLoop *mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm), *ml;
00539     MPoly *mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm), *mp;
00540     /*MFace *mf;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00541     int totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00542     int totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00543     /*int totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);*/ /*UNUSED*/
00544     /*int totpoly = dm->getNumFaces(dm);*/ /*UNUSED*/
00545     int i, j;
00546     int *index;
00547 
00548     ccgSubSurf_initFullSync(ss);
00549 
00550     mv = mvert;
00551     index = (int *)dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00552     for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++, mv++) {
00553         CCGVert *v;
00554 
00555         if (vertexCos) {
00556             ccgSubSurf_syncVert(ss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), vertexCos[i], 0, &v);
00557         }
00558         else {
00559             ccgSubSurf_syncVert(ss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), mv->co, 0, &v);
00560         }
00561 
00562         ((int *)ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v))[1] = (index) ? *index++ : i;
00563     }
00564 
00565     me = medge;
00566     index = (int *)dm->getEdgeDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00567     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++, me++) {
00568         CCGEdge *e;
00569         float crease;
00570 
00571         crease = useFlatSubdiv ? creaseFactor :
00572                  me->crease * creaseFactor / 255.0f;
00573 
00574         ccgSubSurf_syncEdge(ss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v1),
00575                             SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v2), crease, &e);
00576 
00577         ((int *)ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e))[1] = (index) ? *index++ : i;
00578     }
00579 
00580     mp = mpoly;
00581     index = DM_get_poly_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00582     for (i = 0; i < dm->numPolyData; i++, mp++) {
00583         CCGFace *f;
00584 
00585         BLI_array_empty(fVerts);
00586         BLI_array_growitems(fVerts, mp->totloop);
00587 
00588         ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00589         for (j = 0; j < mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00590             fVerts[j] = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml->v);
00591         }
00592 
00593         /* this is very bad, means mesh is internally inconsistent.
00594          * it is not really possible to continue without modifying
00595          * other parts of code significantly to handle missing faces.
00596          * since this really shouldn't even be possible we just bail.*/
00597         if (ccgSubSurf_syncFace(ss, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i), mp->totloop,
00598                                 fVerts, &f) == eCCGError_InvalidValue) {
00599             static int hasGivenError = 0;
00600 
00601             if (!hasGivenError) {
00602                 //XXX error("Unrecoverable error in SubSurf calculation,"
00603                 //      " mesh is inconsistent.");
00604 
00605                 hasGivenError = 1;
00606             }
00607 
00608             return;
00609         }
00610 
00611         ((int *)ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f))[1] = (index) ? *index++ : i;
00612     }
00613 
00614     ccgSubSurf_processSync(ss);
00615 
00616     BLI_array_free(fVerts);
00617 }
00618 
00619 /***/
00620

00622 {
00623     return ((int *) ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v))[1];
00624 }

00627 {
00628     return ((int *) ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e))[1];
00629 }
00630 
00631 static int ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f)
00632 {

00634 }
00635 
00636 static void ccgDM_getMinMax(DerivedMesh *dm, float min_r[3], float max_r[3])
00637 {
00638     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00639     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
00640     CCGVertIterator *vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ss);
00641     CCGEdgeIterator *ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
00642     CCGFaceIterator *fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(ss);
00643     int i, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
00644     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
00645 
00646     if (!ccgSubSurf_getNumVerts(ss))
00647         min_r[0] = min_r[1] = min_r[2] = max_r[0] = max_r[1] = max_r[2] = 0.0;
00648 
00649     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
00650         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
00651         float *co = ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v);
00652 
00653         DO_MINMAX(co, min_r, max_r);
00654     }
00655 
00656     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
00657         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
00658         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
00659 
00660         for (i = 0; i < edgeSize; i++)
00661             DO_MINMAX(edgeData[i].co, min_r, max_r);
00662     }
00663 
00664     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
00665         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
00666         int S, x, y, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
00667 
00668         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
00669             DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
00670 
00671             for (y = 0; y < gridSize; y++)
00672                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++)
00673                     DO_MINMAX(faceGridData[y * gridSize + x].co, min_r, max_r);
00674         }
00675     }
00676 
00677     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
00678     ccgEdgeIterator_free(ei);
00679     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
00680 }
00681 
00682 static int ccgDM_getNumVerts(DerivedMesh *dm)
00683 {
00684     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00685 
00686     return ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalVerts(ccgdm->ss);
00687 }

00696 static int ccgDM_getNumTessFaces(DerivedMesh *dm)
00697 {
00698     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;

00702 
00703 static int ccgDM_getNumLoops(DerivedMesh *dm)
00704 {
00705     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00706 
00707     /* All subsurf faces are quads */
00708     return 4 * ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ccgdm->ss);
00709 }
00710 
00711 static void ccgDM_getFinalVert(DerivedMesh *dm, int vertNum, MVert *mv)
00712 {
00713     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00714     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
00715     DMGridData *vd;
00716     int i;
00717 
00718     memset(mv, 0, sizeof(*mv));
00719 
00720     if ((vertNum < ccgdm->edgeMap[0].startVert) && (ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss) > 0)) {
00721         /* this vert comes from face data */
00722         int lastface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss) - 1;
00723         CCGFace *f;
00724         int x, y, grid, numVerts;
00725         int offset;
00726         int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
00727         int gridSideVerts;
00728         int gridInternalVerts;
00729         int gridSideEnd;
00730         int gridInternalEnd;
00731 
00732         i = 0;
00733         while (i < lastface && vertNum >= ccgdm->faceMap[i + 1].startVert)
00734             ++i;
00735 
00736         f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
00737         numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
00738 
00739         gridSideVerts = gridSize - 2;
00740         gridInternalVerts = gridSideVerts * gridSideVerts;
00741 
00742         gridSideEnd = 1 + numVerts * gridSideVerts;
00743         gridInternalEnd = gridSideEnd + numVerts * gridInternalVerts;
00744 
00745         offset = vertNum - ccgdm->faceMap[i].startVert;
00746         if (offset < 1) {
00747             vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(f);
00748             copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vd->co);
00749             normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, vd->no);
00750         }
00751         else if (offset < gridSideEnd) {
00752             offset -= 1;
00753             grid = offset / gridSideVerts;
00754             x = offset % gridSideVerts + 1;
00755             vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(ss, f, grid, x);
00756             copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vd->co);
00757             normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, vd->no);
00758         }
00759         else if (offset < gridInternalEnd) {
00760             offset -= gridSideEnd;
00761             grid = offset / gridInternalVerts;
00762             offset %= gridInternalVerts;
00763             y = offset / gridSideVerts + 1;
00764             x = offset % gridSideVerts + 1;
00765             vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, grid, x, y);
00766             copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vd->co);
00767             normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, vd->no);
00768         }
00769     }
00770     else if ((vertNum < ccgdm->vertMap[0].startVert) && (ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss) > 0)) {
00771         /* this vert comes from edge data */
00772         CCGEdge *e;
00773         int lastedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss) - 1;
00774         int x;
00775 
00776         i = 0;
00777         while (i < lastedge && vertNum >= ccgdm->edgeMap[i + 1].startVert)
00778             ++i;
00779 
00780         e = ccgdm->edgeMap[i].edge;
00781 
00782         x = vertNum - ccgdm->edgeMap[i].startVert + 1;
00783         vd = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeData(ss, e, x);
00784         copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vd->co);
00785         normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, vd->no);
00786     }
00787     else {
00788         /* this vert comes from vert data */
00789         CCGVert *v;
00790         i = vertNum - ccgdm->vertMap[0].startVert;
00791 
00792         v = ccgdm->vertMap[i].vert;
00793         vd = ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v);
00794         copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vd->co);
00795         normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, vd->no);
00796     }
00797 }
00798 
00799 static void ccgDM_getFinalVertCo(DerivedMesh *dm, int vertNum, float co_r[3])
00800 {
00801     MVert mvert;
00802 
00803     ccgDM_getFinalVert(dm, vertNum, &mvert);
00804     copy_v3_v3(co_r, mvert.co);
00805 }
00806 
00807 static void ccgDM_getFinalVertNo(DerivedMesh *dm, int vertNum, float no_r[3])
00808 {
00809     MVert mvert;
00810 
00811     ccgDM_getFinalVert(dm, vertNum, &mvert);
00812     normal_short_to_float_v3(no_r, mvert.no);
00813 }
00814 
00815 static void ccgDM_getFinalEdge(DerivedMesh *dm, int edgeNum, MEdge *med)
00816 {
00817     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00818     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
00819     int i;
00820 
00821     memset(med, 0, sizeof(*med));
00822 
00823     if (edgeNum < ccgdm->edgeMap[0].startEdge) {
00824         /* this edge comes from face data */
00825         int lastface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss) - 1;
00826         CCGFace *f;
00827         int x, y, grid /*, numVerts*/;
00828         int offset;
00829         int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
00830         int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
00831         int gridSideEdges;
00832         int gridInternalEdges;
00833 
00834         /* code added in bmesh but works correctly without, commenting - campbell */
00835 #if 0
00836         int lasti, previ;
00837         i = lastface;
00838         lasti = 0;
00839         while (1) {
00840             previ = i;
00841             if (ccgdm->faceMap[i].startEdge >= edgeNum) {
00842                 i -= fabsf(i - lasti) / 2.0f;
00843             }
00844             else if (ccgdm->faceMap[i].startEdge < edgeNum) {
00845                 i += fabsf(i - lasti) / 2.0f;
00846             }
00847             else {
00848                 break;
00849             }
00850 
00851             if (i < 0) {
00852                 i = 0;
00853                 break;
00854             }
00855 
00856             if (i > lastface) {
00857                 i = lastface;
00858                 break;
00859 
00860             }
00861 
00862             if (i == lasti)
00863                 break;
00864 
00865             lasti = previ;
00866         }
00867 
00868         i = i > 0 ? i - 1 : i;
00869 #endif
00870 
00871         i = 0;
00872         while (i < lastface && edgeNum >= ccgdm->faceMap[i + 1].startEdge)
00873             ++i;
00874 
00875         f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
00876         /* numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f); */ /*UNUSED*/
00877 
00878         gridSideEdges = gridSize - 1;
00879         gridInternalEdges = (gridSideEdges - 1) * gridSideEdges * 2; 
00880 
00881         offset = edgeNum - ccgdm->faceMap[i].startEdge;
00882         grid = offset / (gridSideEdges + gridInternalEdges);
00883         offset %= (gridSideEdges + gridInternalEdges);
00884 
00885         if (offset < gridSideEdges) {
00886             x = offset;
00887             med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x, 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
00888             med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x + 1, 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
00889         }
00890         else {
00891             offset -= gridSideEdges;
00892             x = (offset / 2) / gridSideEdges + 1;
00893             y = (offset / 2) % gridSideEdges;
00894             if (offset % 2 == 0) {
00895                 med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x, y, edgeSize, gridSize);
00896                 med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x, y + 1, edgeSize, gridSize);
00897             }
00898             else {
00899                 med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, y, x, edgeSize, gridSize);
00900                 med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, y + 1, x, edgeSize, gridSize);
00901             }
00902         }
00903     }
00904     else {
00905         /* this vert comes from edge data */
00906         CCGEdge *e;
00907         int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
00908         int x;
00909         short *edgeFlag;
00910         unsigned int flags = 0;
00911 
00912         i = (edgeNum - ccgdm->edgeMap[0].startEdge) / (edgeSize - 1);
00913 
00914         e = ccgdm->edgeMap[i].edge;
00915 
00916         if (!ccgSubSurf_getEdgeNumFaces(e)) flags |= ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00917 
00918         x = edgeNum - ccgdm->edgeMap[i].startEdge;
00919 
00920         med->v1 = getEdgeIndex(ss, e, x, edgeSize);
00921         med->v2 = getEdgeIndex(ss, e, x + 1, edgeSize);
00922 
00923         edgeFlag = (ccgdm->edgeFlags) ? &ccgdm->edgeFlags[i] : NULL;
00924         if (edgeFlag)
00925             flags |= (*edgeFlag & (ME_SEAM | ME_SHARP)) | ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
00926         else
00927             flags |= ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
00928 
00929         med->flag = flags;
00930     }
00931 }
00932 
00933 static void ccgDM_getFinalFace(DerivedMesh *dm, int faceNum, MFace *mf)
00934 {
00935     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
00936     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
00937     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
00938     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
00939     int gridSideEdges = gridSize - 1;
00940     int gridFaces = gridSideEdges * gridSideEdges;
00941     int i;
00942     CCGFace *f;
00943     /*int numVerts;*/
00944     int offset;
00945     int grid;
00946     int x, y;
00947     /*int lastface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss) - 1;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00948     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
00949 
00950     memset(mf, 0, sizeof(*mf));
00951     if (faceNum >= ccgdm->dm.numTessFaceData)
00952         return;
00953 
00954     i = ccgdm->reverseFaceMap[faceNum];
00955 
00956     f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
00957     /*numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);*/ /*UNUSED*/
00958 
00959     offset = faceNum - ccgdm->faceMap[i].startFace;
00960     grid = offset / gridFaces;
00961     offset %= gridFaces;
00962     y = offset / gridSideEdges;
00963     x = offset % gridSideEdges;
00964 
00965     mf->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x + 0, y + 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
00966     mf->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x + 0, y + 1, edgeSize, gridSize);
00967     mf->v3 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x + 1, y + 1, edgeSize, gridSize);
00968     mf->v4 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, grid, x + 1, y + 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
00969 
00970     if (faceFlags) {
00971         mf->flag = faceFlags[i].flag;
00972         mf->mat_nr = faceFlags[i].mat_nr;
00973     }
00974     else mf->flag = ME_SMOOTH;
00975 }
00976 
00977 /* Translate GridHidden into the ME_HIDE flag for MVerts. Assumes
00978  * vertices are in the order output by ccgDM_copyFinalVertArray. */
00979 void subsurf_copy_grid_hidden(DerivedMesh *dm, const MPoly *mpoly,
00980                               MVert *mvert, const MDisps *mdisps)
00981 {
00982     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
00983     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
00984     int level = ccgSubSurf_getSubdivisionLevels(ss);
00985     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
00986     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
00987     int totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
00988     int i, j, x, y;
00989     
00990     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
00991         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
00992 
00993         for (j = 0; j < mpoly[i].totloop; j++) {
00994             const MDisps *md = &mdisps[mpoly[i].loopstart + j];
00995             int hidden_gridsize = ccg_gridsize(md->level);
00996             int factor = ccg_factor(level, md->level);
00997             
00998             if (!md->hidden)
00999                 continue;
01000             
01001             for (y = 0; y < gridSize; y++) {
01002                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++) {
01003                     int vndx, offset;
01004                     
01005                     vndx = getFaceIndex(ss, f, j, x, y, edgeSize, gridSize);
01006                     offset = (y * factor) * hidden_gridsize + (x * factor);
01007                     if (BLI_BITMAP_GET(md->hidden, offset))
01008                         mvert[vndx].flag |= ME_HIDE;
01009                 }
01010             }
01011         }
01012     }
01013 }
01014 
01015 static void ccgDM_copyFinalVertArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MVert *mvert)
01016 {
01017     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01018     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01019     DMGridData *vd;
01020     int index;
01021     int totvert, totedge, totface;
01022     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01023     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01024     int i = 0;
01025 
01026     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01027     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01028         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
01029         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01030 
01031         vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(f);
01032         copy_v3_v3(mvert[i].co, vd->co);
01033         normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert[i].no, vd->no);
01034         i++;
01035         
01036         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01037             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++, i++) {
01038                 vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(ss, f, S, x);
01039                 copy_v3_v3(mvert[i].co, vd->co);
01040                 normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert[i].no, vd->no);
01041             }
01042         }
01043 
01044         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01045             for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01046                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++, i++) {
01047                     vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, S, x, y);
01048                     copy_v3_v3(mvert[i].co, vd->co);
01049                     normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert[i].no, vd->no);
01050                 }
01051             }
01052         }
01053     }
01054 
01055     totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
01056     for (index = 0; index < totedge; index++) {
01057         CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[index].edge;
01058         int x;
01059 
01060         for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++, i++) {
01061             vd = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeData(ss, e, x);
01062             copy_v3_v3(mvert[i].co, vd->co);
01063             /* This gives errors with -debug-fpe
01064              * the normals don't seem to be unit length.
01065              * this is most likely caused by edges with no
01066              * faces which are now zerod out, see comment in:
01067              * ccgSubSurf__calcVertNormals(), - campbell */
01068             normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert[i].no, vd->no);
01069         }
01070     }
01071 
01072     totvert = ccgSubSurf_getNumVerts(ss);
01073     for (index = 0; index < totvert; index++) {
01074         CCGVert *v = ccgdm->vertMap[index].vert;
01075 
01076         vd = ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v);
01077         copy_v3_v3(mvert[i].co, vd->co);
01078         normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert[i].no, vd->no);
01079         i++;
01080     }
01081 }
01082 
01083 static void ccgDM_copyFinalEdgeArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MEdge *medge)
01084 {
01085     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01086     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01087     int index;
01088     int totedge, totface;
01089     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01090     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01091     int i = 0;
01092     short *edgeFlags = ccgdm->edgeFlags;
01093 
01094     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01095     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01096         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
01097         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01098 
01099         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01100             for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01101                 MEdge *med = &medge[i];
01102 
01103                 if (ccgdm->drawInteriorEdges)
01104                     med->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
01105                 med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x, 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
01106                 med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 1, 0, edgeSize, gridSize);
01107                 i++;
01108             }
01109 
01110             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01111                 for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01112                     MEdge *med;
01113 
01114                     med = &medge[i];
01115                     if (ccgdm->drawInteriorEdges)
01116                         med->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
01117                     med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x, y,
01118                                            edgeSize, gridSize);
01119                     med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x, y + 1,
01120                                            edgeSize, gridSize);
01121                     i++;
01122 
01123                     med = &medge[i];
01124                     if (ccgdm->drawInteriorEdges)
01125                         med->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
01126                     med->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, y, x,
01127                                            edgeSize, gridSize);
01128                     med->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, y + 1, x,
01129                                            edgeSize, gridSize);
01130                     i++;
01131                 }
01132             }
01133         }
01134     }
01135 
01136     totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
01137     for (index = 0; index < totedge; index++) {
01138         CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[index].edge;
01139         unsigned int flags = 0;
01140         int x;
01141         int edgeIdx = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeEdgeHandle(e));
01142 
01143         if (!ccgSubSurf_getEdgeNumFaces(e)) flags |= ME_LOOSEEDGE;
01144 
01145         if (edgeFlags) {
01146             if (edgeIdx != -1) {
01147                 flags |= (edgeFlags[index] & (ME_SEAM | ME_SHARP))
01148                          | ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
01149             }
01150         }
01151         else {
01152             flags |= ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER;
01153         }
01154 
01155         for (x = 0; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01156             MEdge *med = &medge[i];
01157             med->v1 = getEdgeIndex(ss, e, x, edgeSize);
01158             med->v2 = getEdgeIndex(ss, e, x + 1, edgeSize);
01159             med->flag = flags;
01160             i++;
01161         }
01162     }
01163 }
01164 
01165 static void ccgDM_copyFinalFaceArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MFace *mface)
01166 {
01167     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01168     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01169     int index;
01170     int totface;
01171     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01172     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01173     int i = 0;
01174     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
01175 
01176     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01177     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01178         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
01179         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01180         /* keep types in sync with MFace, avoid many conversions */
01181         char flag = (faceFlags) ? faceFlags[index].flag : ME_SMOOTH;
01182         short mat_nr = (faceFlags) ? faceFlags[index].mat_nr : 0;
01183 
01184         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01185             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01186                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01187                     MFace *mf = &mface[i];
01188                     mf->v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 0, y + 0,
01189                                           edgeSize, gridSize);
01190                     mf->v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 0, y + 1,
01191                                           edgeSize, gridSize);
01192                     mf->v3 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 1, y + 1,
01193                                           edgeSize, gridSize);
01194                     mf->v4 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 1, y + 0,
01195                                           edgeSize, gridSize);
01196                     mf->mat_nr = mat_nr;
01197                     mf->flag = flag;
01198 
01199                     i++;
01200                 }
01201             }
01202         }
01203     }
01204 }
01205 
01206 static void ccgDM_copyFinalLoopArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MLoop *mloop)
01207 {
01208     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01209     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01210     int index;
01211     int totface;
01212     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01213     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01214     int i = 0;
01215     MLoop *mv;
01216     /* DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags; */ /* UNUSED */
01217 
01218     if (!ccgdm->ehash) {
01219         MEdge *medge;
01220 
01221         ccgdm->ehash = BLI_edgehash_new();
01222         medge = ccgdm->dm.getEdgeArray((DerivedMesh *)ccgdm);
01223 
01224         for (i = 0; i < ccgdm->dm.numEdgeData; i++) {
01225             BLI_edgehash_insert(ccgdm->ehash, medge[i].v1, medge[i].v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
01226         }
01227     }
01228 
01229     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01230     mv = mloop;
01231     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01232         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
01233         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01234         /* int flag = (faceFlags)? faceFlags[index*2]: ME_SMOOTH; */ /* UNUSED */
01235         /* int mat_nr = (faceFlags)? faceFlags[index*2+1]: 0; */ /* UNUSED */
01236 
01237         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01238             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01239                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01240                     int v1, v2, v3, v4;
01241 
01242                     v1 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 0, y + 0,
01243                                       edgeSize, gridSize);
01244 
01245                     v2 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 0, y + 1,
01246                                       edgeSize, gridSize);
01247                     v3 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 1, y + 1,
01248                                       edgeSize, gridSize);
01249                     v4 = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + 1, y + 0,
01250                                       edgeSize, gridSize);
01251 
01252                     mv->v = v1;
01253                     mv->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(ccgdm->ehash, v1, v2));
01254                     mv++, i++;
01255 
01256                     mv->v = v2;
01257                     mv->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(ccgdm->ehash, v2, v3));
01258                     mv++, i++;
01259 
01260                     mv->v = v3;
01261                     mv->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(ccgdm->ehash, v3, v4));
01262                     mv++, i++;
01263 
01264                     mv->v = v4;
01265                     mv->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(ccgdm->ehash, v4, v1));
01266                     mv++, i++;
01267                 }
01268             }
01269         }
01270     }
01271 }
01272 
01273 static void ccgDM_copyFinalPolyArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MPoly *mpoly)
01274 {
01275     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01276     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01277     int index;
01278     int totface;
01279     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01280     /* int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss); */ /* UNUSED */
01281     int i = 0, k = 0;
01282     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
01283 
01284     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01285     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01286         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
01287         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01288         int flag = (faceFlags) ? faceFlags[index].flag : ME_SMOOTH;
01289         int mat_nr = (faceFlags) ? faceFlags[index].mat_nr : 0;
01290 
01291         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01292             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01293                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01294                     MPoly *mp = &mpoly[i];
01295 
01296                     mp->mat_nr = mat_nr;
01297                     mp->flag = flag;
01298                     mp->loopstart = k;
01299                     mp->totloop = 4;
01300 
01301                     k += 4;
01302                     i++;
01303                 }
01304             }
01305         }
01306     }
01307 }
01308 
01309 static void ccgdm_getVertCos(DerivedMesh *dm, float (*cos)[3])
01310 {
01311     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01312     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01313     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01314     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01315     int i;
01316     CCGVertIterator *vi;
01317     CCGEdgeIterator *ei;
01318     CCGFaceIterator *fi;
01319     CCGFace **faceMap2;
01320     CCGEdge **edgeMap2;
01321     CCGVert **vertMap2;
01322     int index, totvert, totedge, totface;
01323     
01324     totvert = ccgSubSurf_getNumVerts(ss);
01325     vertMap2 = MEM_mallocN(totvert * sizeof(*vertMap2), "vertmap");
01326     vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ss);
01327     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
01328         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
01329 
01330         vertMap2[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v))] = v;
01331     }
01332     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
01333 
01334     totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
01335     edgeMap2 = MEM_mallocN(totedge * sizeof(*edgeMap2), "edgemap");
01336     ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
01337     for (i = 0; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); i++, ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
01338         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
01339 
01340         edgeMap2[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeEdgeHandle(e))] = e;
01341     }
01342 
01343     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01344     faceMap2 = MEM_mallocN(totface * sizeof(*faceMap2), "facemap");
01345     fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(ss);
01346     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
01347         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
01348 
01349         faceMap2[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f))] = f;
01350     }
01351     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
01352 
01353     i = 0;
01354     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
01355         CCGFace *f = faceMap2[index];
01356         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01357 
01358         copy_v3_v3(cos[i++], ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(f));
01359         
01360         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01361             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01362                 copy_v3_v3(cos[i++], ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(ss, f, S, x));
01363             }
01364         }
01365 
01366         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01367             for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01368                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01369                     copy_v3_v3(cos[i++], ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, S, x, y));
01370                 }
01371             }
01372         }
01373     }
01374 
01375     for (index = 0; index < totedge; index++) {
01376         CCGEdge *e = edgeMap2[index];
01377         int x;
01378 
01379         for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01380             copy_v3_v3(cos[i++], ccgSubSurf_getEdgeData(ss, e, x));
01381         }
01382     }
01383 
01384     for (index = 0; index < totvert; index++) {
01385         CCGVert *v = vertMap2[index];
01386         copy_v3_v3(cos[i++], ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v));
01387     }
01388 
01389     MEM_freeN(vertMap2);
01390     MEM_freeN(edgeMap2);
01391     MEM_freeN(faceMap2);
01392 }
01393 
01394 static void ccgDM_foreachMappedVert(
01395     DerivedMesh *dm,
01396     void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float co[3], const float no_f[3], const short no_s[3]),
01397     void *userData)
01398 {
01399     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01400     CCGVertIterator *vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ccgdm->ss);
01401 
01402     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
01403         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
01404         DMGridData *vd = ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ccgdm->ss, v);
01405         int index = ccgDM_getVertMapIndex(ccgdm->ss, v);
01406 
01407         if (index != -1)
01408             func(userData, index, vd->co, vd->no, NULL);
01409     }
01410 
01411     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
01412 }
01413 
01414 static void ccgDM_foreachMappedEdge(
01415     DerivedMesh *dm,
01416     void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float v0co[3], const float v1co[3]),
01417     void *userData)
01418 {
01419     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01420     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01421     CCGEdgeIterator *ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
01422     int i, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01423 
01424     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
01425         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
01426         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
01427         int index = ccgDM_getEdgeMapIndex(ss, e);
01428 
01429         if (index != -1) {
01430             for (i = 0; i < edgeSize - 1; i++)
01431                 func(userData, index, edgeData[i].co, edgeData[i + 1].co);
01432         }
01433     }
01434 
01435     ccgEdgeIterator_free(ei);
01436 }
01437 
01438 static void ccgDM_drawVerts(DerivedMesh *dm)
01439 {
01440     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01441     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01442     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01443     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01444     CCGVertIterator *vi;
01445     CCGEdgeIterator *ei;
01446     CCGFaceIterator *fi;
01447 
01448     glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01449     vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ss);
01450     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
01451         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
01452         glVertex3fv(ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v));
01453     }
01454     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
01455 
01456     ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
01457     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
01458         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
01459         int x;
01460 
01461         for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++)
01462             glVertex3fv(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeData(ss, e, x));
01463     }
01464     ccgEdgeIterator_free(ei);
01465 
01466     fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(ss);
01467     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
01468         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
01469         int x, y, S, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01470 
01471         glVertex3fv(ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(f));
01472         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++)
01473             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
01474                 glVertex3fv(ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(ss, f, S, x));
01475         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++)
01476             for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++)
01477                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
01478                     glVertex3fv(ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, S, x, y));
01479     }
01480     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
01481     glEnd();
01482 }
01483 
01484 static void ccgdm_pbvh_update(CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm)
01485 {
01486     if (ccgdm->pbvh && ccgDM_use_grid_pbvh(ccgdm)) {
01487         CCGFace **faces;
01488         int totface;
01489 
01490         BLI_pbvh_get_grid_updates(ccgdm->pbvh, 1, (void ***)&faces, &totface);
01491         if (totface) {
01492             ccgSubSurf_updateFromFaces(ccgdm->ss, 0, faces, totface);
01493             ccgSubSurf_updateNormals(ccgdm->ss, faces, totface);
01494             MEM_freeN(faces);
01495         }
01496     }
01497 }
01498 
01499 static void ccgDM_drawEdges(DerivedMesh *dm, int drawLooseEdges, int drawAllEdges)
01500 {
01501     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01502     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01503     int i, j, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01504     int totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
01505     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01506     int useAging;
01507 
01508     ccgdm_pbvh_update(ccgdm);
01509 
01510     ccgSubSurf_getUseAgeCounts(ss, &useAging, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01511 
01512     for (j = 0; j < totedge; j++) {
01513         CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[j].edge;
01514         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
01515 
01516         if (!drawLooseEdges && !ccgSubSurf_getEdgeNumFaces(e))
01517             continue;
01518 
01519         if (!drawAllEdges && ccgdm->edgeFlags && !(ccgdm->edgeFlags[j] & ME_EDGEDRAW))
01520             continue;
01521 
01522         if (useAging && !(G.f & G_BACKBUFSEL)) {
01523             int ageCol = 255 - ccgSubSurf_getEdgeAge(ss, e) * 4;
01524             glColor3ub(0, ageCol > 0 ? ageCol : 0, 0);
01525         }
01526 
01527         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01528         for (i = 0; i < edgeSize - 1; i++) {
01529             glVertex3fv(edgeData[i].co);
01530             glVertex3fv(edgeData[i + 1].co);
01531         }
01532         glEnd();
01533     }
01534 
01535     if (useAging && !(G.f & G_BACKBUFSEL)) {
01536         glColor3ub(0, 0, 0);
01537     }
01538 
01539     if (ccgdm->drawInteriorEdges) {
01540         int totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01541 
01542         for (j = 0; j < totface; j++) {
01543             CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[j].face;
01544             int S, x, y, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01545 
01546             for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01547                 DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
01548 
01549                 glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01550                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++)
01551                     glVertex3fv(faceGridData[x].co);
01552                 glEnd();
01553                 for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01554                     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01555                     for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++)
01556                         glVertex3fv(faceGridData[y * gridSize + x].co);
01557                     glEnd();
01558                 }
01559                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01560                     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01561                     for (y = 0; y < gridSize; y++)
01562                         glVertex3fv(faceGridData[y * gridSize + x].co);
01563                     glEnd();
01564                 }
01565             }
01566         }
01567     }
01568 }
01569 
01570 static void ccgDM_drawLooseEdges(DerivedMesh *dm)
01571 {
01572     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01573     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01574     int totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
01575     int i, j, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01576 
01577     for (j = 0; j < totedge; j++) {
01578         CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[j].edge;
01579         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
01580 
01581         if (!ccgSubSurf_getEdgeNumFaces(e)) {
01582             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01583             for (i = 0; i < edgeSize - 1; i++) {
01584                 glVertex3fv(edgeData[i].co);
01585                 glVertex3fv(edgeData[i + 1].co);
01586             }
01587             glEnd();
01588         }
01589     }
01590 }
01591 
01592 static void ccgDM_glNormalFast(float *a, float *b, float *c, float *d)
01593 {
01594     float a_cX = c[0] - a[0], a_cY = c[1] - a[1], a_cZ = c[2] - a[2];
01595     float b_dX = d[0] - b[0], b_dY = d[1] - b[1], b_dZ = d[2] - b[2];
01596     float no[3];
01597 
01598     no[0] = b_dY * a_cZ - b_dZ * a_cY;
01599     no[1] = b_dZ * a_cX - b_dX * a_cZ;
01600     no[2] = b_dX * a_cY - b_dY * a_cX;
01601 
01602     /* don't normalize, GL_NORMALIZE is enabled */
01603     glNormal3fv(no);
01604 }
01605 
01606 /* Only used by non-editmesh types */
01607 static void ccgDM_drawFacesSolid(DerivedMesh *dm, float (*partial_redraw_planes)[4], int fast, DMSetMaterial setMaterial)
01608 {
01609     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01610     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01611     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01612     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
01613     int step = (fast) ? gridSize - 1 : 1;
01614     int i, totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01615     int drawcurrent = 0, matnr = -1, shademodel = -1;
01616 
01617     ccgdm_pbvh_update(ccgdm);
01618 
01619     if (ccgdm->pbvh && ccgdm->multires.mmd && !fast) {
01620         if (dm->numTessFaceData) {
01621             BLI_pbvh_draw(ccgdm->pbvh, partial_redraw_planes, NULL, setMaterial);
01622             glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
01623         }
01624 
01625         return;
01626     }
01627 
01628     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
01629         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
01630         int S, x, y, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01631         int index = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
01632         int new_matnr, new_shademodel;
01633 
01634         if (faceFlags) {
01635             new_shademodel = (faceFlags[index].flag & ME_SMOOTH) ? GL_SMOOTH : GL_FLAT;
01636             new_matnr = faceFlags[index].mat_nr;
01637         }
01638         else {
01639             new_shademodel = GL_SMOOTH;
01640             new_matnr = 0;
01641         }
01642         
01643         if (shademodel != new_shademodel || matnr != new_matnr) {
01644             matnr = new_matnr;
01645             shademodel = new_shademodel;
01646 
01647             drawcurrent = setMaterial(matnr + 1, NULL);
01648 
01649             glShadeModel(shademodel);
01650         }
01651 
01652         if (!drawcurrent)
01653             continue;
01654 
01655         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01656             DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
01657 
01658             if (shademodel == GL_SMOOTH) {
01659                 for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y += step) {
01660                     glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
01661                     for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x += step) {
01662                         DMGridData *a = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
01663                         DMGridData *b = &faceGridData[(y + step) * gridSize + x];
01664 
01665                         glNormal3fv(a->no);
01666                         glVertex3fv(a->co);
01667                         glNormal3fv(b->no);
01668                         glVertex3fv(b->co);
01669                     }
01670                     glEnd();
01671                 }
01672             }
01673             else {
01674                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01675                 for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y += step) {
01676                     for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x += step) {
01677                         float *a = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x].co;
01678                         float *b = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + step].co;
01679                         float *c = faceGridData[(y + step) * gridSize + x + step].co;
01680                         float *d = faceGridData[(y + step) * gridSize + x].co;
01681 
01682                         ccgDM_glNormalFast(a, b, c, d);
01683 
01684                         glVertex3fv(d);
01685                         glVertex3fv(c);
01686                         glVertex3fv(b);
01687                         glVertex3fv(a);
01688                     }
01689                 }
01690                 glEnd();
01691             }
01692         }
01693     }
01694 }
01695 
01696 /* Only used by non-editmesh types */
01697 static void ccgDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL(DerivedMesh *dm,
01698                                       DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
01699                                       DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
01700                                       void *userData)
01701 {
01702     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01703     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01704     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01705     DMVertexAttribs attribs = {{{NULL}}};
01706     /* MTFace *tf = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MTFACE); */ /* UNUSED */
01707     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01708     int gridFaces = gridSize - 1;
01709     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01710     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
01711     int a, b, i, doDraw, numVerts, matnr, new_matnr, totface;
01712 
01713     ccgdm_pbvh_update(ccgdm);
01714 
01715     doDraw = 0;
01716     matnr = -1;
01717 
01718 #define PASSATTRIB(dx, dy, vert) {                                              \
01719     if (attribs.totorco) {                                                      \
01720         index = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + dx, y + dy, edgeSize, gridSize);     \
01721         glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs.orco.glIndex, attribs.orco.array[index]);  \
01722     }                                                                           \
01723     for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {                                    \
01724         MTFace *tf = &attribs.tface[b].array[a];                                \
01725         glVertexAttrib2fvARB(attribs.tface[b].glIndex, tf->uv[vert]);           \
01726     }                                                                           \
01727     for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {                                     \
01728         MCol *cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a * 4 + vert];                        \
01729         GLubyte col[4];                                                         \
01730         col[0] = cp->b; col[1] = cp->g; col[2] = cp->r; col[3] = cp->a;         \
01731         glVertexAttrib4ubvARB(attribs.mcol[b].glIndex, col);                    \
01732     }                                                                           \
01733     if (attribs.tottang) {                                                      \
01734         float *tang = attribs.tang.array[a * 4 + vert];                         \
01735         glVertexAttrib4fvARB(attribs.tang.glIndex, tang);                       \
01736     }                                                                           \
01737 }
01738 
01739     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01740     for (a = 0, i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
01741         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
01742         int S, x, y, drawSmooth;
01743         int index = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
01744         int origIndex = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
01745         
01746         numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01747 
01748         if (faceFlags) {
01749             drawSmooth = (faceFlags[index].flag & ME_SMOOTH);
01750             new_matnr = faceFlags[index].mat_nr + 1;
01751         }
01752         else {
01753             drawSmooth = 1;
01754             new_matnr = 1;
01755         }
01756 
01757         if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01758             doDraw = setMaterial(matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01759             if (doDraw)
01760                 DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01761         }
01762 
01763         if (!doDraw || (setDrawOptions && (origIndex != ORIGINDEX_NONE) &&
01764                         (setDrawOptions(userData, origIndex) == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)))
01765         {
01766             a += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts;
01767             continue;
01768         }
01769 
01770         glShadeModel(drawSmooth ? GL_SMOOTH : GL_FLAT);
01771         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01772             DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
01773             DMGridData *vda, *vdb;
01774 
01775             if (drawSmooth) {
01776                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
01777                     glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
01778                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
01779                         vda = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
01780                         vdb = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
01781                         
01782                         PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 0);
01783                         glNormal3fv(vda->no);
01784                         glVertex3fv(vda->co);
01785 
01786                         PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 1);
01787                         glNormal3fv(vdb->no);
01788                         glVertex3fv(vdb->co);
01789 
01790                         if (x != gridFaces - 1)
01791                             a++;
01792                     }
01793 
01794                     vda = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
01795                     vdb = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
01796 
01797                     PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 3);
01798                     glNormal3fv(vda->no);
01799                     glVertex3fv(vda->co);
01800 
01801                     PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 2);
01802                     glNormal3fv(vdb->no);
01803                     glVertex3fv(vdb->co);
01804 
01805                     glEnd();
01806 
01807                     a++;
01808                 }
01809             }
01810             else {
01811                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01812                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
01813                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
01814                         float *aco = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x].co;
01815                         float *bco = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
01816                         float *cco = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
01817                         float *dco = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x].co;
01818 
01819                         ccgDM_glNormalFast(aco, bco, cco, dco);
01820 
01821                         PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 1);
01822                         glVertex3fv(dco);
01823                         PASSATTRIB(1, 1, 2);
01824                         glVertex3fv(cco);
01825                         PASSATTRIB(1, 0, 3);
01826                         glVertex3fv(bco);
01827                         PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 0);
01828                         glVertex3fv(aco);
01829                         
01830                         a++;
01831                     }
01832                 }
01833                 glEnd();
01834             }
01835         }
01836     }
01837 
01838 #undef PASSATTRIB
01839 }
01840 
01841 static void ccgDM_drawFacesGLSL(DerivedMesh *dm, DMSetMaterial setMaterial)
01842 {
01843     dm->drawMappedFacesGLSL(dm, setMaterial, NULL, NULL);
01844 }
