01846 /* Only used by non-editmesh types */
01847 static void ccgDM_drawMappedFacesMat(DerivedMesh *dm, void (*setMaterial)(void *userData, int, void *attribs), int (*setFace)(void *userData, int index), void *userData)
01848 {
01849     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
01850     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
01851     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01852     DMVertexAttribs attribs = {{{NULL}}};
01853     int gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
01854     int gridFaces = gridSize - 1;
01855     int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
01856     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
01857     int a, b, i, numVerts, matnr, new_matnr, totface;
01858 
01859     ccgdm_pbvh_update(ccgdm);
01860 
01861     matnr = -1;
01862 
01863 #define PASSATTRIB(dx, dy, vert) {                                              \
01864     if (attribs.totorco) {                                                      \
01865         index = getFaceIndex(ss, f, S, x + dx, y + dy, edgeSize, gridSize);     \
01866         if (attribs.orco.glTexco)                                               \
01867             glTexCoord3fv(attribs.orco.array[index]);                           \
01868         else                                                                    \
01869             glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs.orco.glIndex, attribs.orco.array[index]);  \
01870     }                                                                           \
01871     for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {                                    \
01872         MTFace *tf = &attribs.tface[b].array[a];                                \
01873         if (attribs.tface[b].glTexco)                                           \
01874             glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[vert]);                                        \
01875         else                                                                    \
01876             glVertexAttrib2fvARB(attribs.tface[b].glIndex, tf->uv[vert]);       \
01877     }                                                                           \
01878     for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {                                     \
01879         MCol *cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a * 4 + vert];                        \
01880         GLubyte col[4];                                                         \
01881         col[0] = cp->b; col[1] = cp->g; col[2] = cp->r; col[3] = cp->a;         \
01882         glVertexAttrib4ubvARB(attribs.mcol[b].glIndex, col);                    \
01883     }                                                                           \
01884     if (attribs.tottang) {                                                      \
01885         float *tang = attribs.tang.array[a * 4 + vert];                         \
01886         glVertexAttrib4fvARB(attribs.tang.glIndex, tang);                       \
01887     }                                                                           \
01888 }
01889 
01890     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
01891     for (a = 0, i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
01892         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
01893         int S, x, y, drawSmooth;
01894         int index = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
01895         int origIndex = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
01896         
01897         numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
01898 
01899         /* get flags */
01900         if (faceFlags) {
01901             drawSmooth = (faceFlags[index].flag & ME_SMOOTH);
01902             new_matnr = faceFlags[index].mat_nr + 1;
01903         }
01904         else {
01905             drawSmooth = 1;
01906             new_matnr = 1;
01907         }
01908 
01909         /* material */
01910         if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01911             setMaterial(userData, matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01912             DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01913         }
01914 
01915         /* face hiding */
01916         if ((setFace && (origIndex != ORIGINDEX_NONE) && !setFace(userData, origIndex))) {
01917             a += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts;
01918             continue;
01919         }
01920 
01921         /* draw face*/
01922         glShadeModel(drawSmooth ? GL_SMOOTH : GL_FLAT);
01923         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
01924             DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
01925             DMGridData *vda, *vdb;
01926 
01927             if (drawSmooth) {
01928                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
01929                     glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
01930                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
01931                         vda = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
01932                         vdb = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
01933                         
01934                         PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 0);
01935                         glNormal3fv(vda->no);
01936                         glVertex3fv(vda->co);
01937 
01938                         PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 1);
01939                         glNormal3fv(vdb->no);
01940                         glVertex3fv(vdb->co);
01941 
01942                         if (x != gridFaces - 1)
01943                             a++;
01944                     }
01945 
01946                     vda = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
01947                     vdb = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
01948 
01949                     PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 3);
01950                     glNormal3fv(vda->no);
01951                     glVertex3fv(vda->co);
01952 
01953                     PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 2);
01954                     glNormal3fv(vdb->no);
01955                     glVertex3fv(vdb->co);
01956 
01957                     glEnd();
01958 
01959                     a++;
01960                 }
01961             }
01962             else {
01963                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01964                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
01965                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
01966                         float *aco = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x].co;
01967                         float *bco = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
01968                         float *cco = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
01969                         float *dco = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x].co;
01970 
01971                         ccgDM_glNormalFast(aco, bco, cco, dco);
01972 
01973                         PASSATTRIB(0, 1, 1);
01974                         glVertex3fv(dco);
01975                         PASSATTRIB(1, 1, 2);
01976                         glVertex3fv(cco);
01977                         PASSATTRIB(1, 0, 3);
01978                         glVertex3fv(bco);
01979                         PASSATTRIB(0, 0, 0);
01980                         glVertex3fv(aco);
01981                         
01982                         a++;
01983                     }
01984                 }
01985                 glEnd();
01986             }
01987         }
01988     }
01989 
01990 #undef PASSATTRIB
01991 }
01992 
01993 static void ccgDM_drawFacesTex_common(DerivedMesh *dm,
01994                                       DMSetDrawOptionsTex drawParams,
01995                                       DMSetDrawOptions drawParamsMapped,
01996                                       DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
01997                                       void *userData)
01998 {
01999     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02000     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02001     MCol *mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
02002     MTFace *tf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE);
02003     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
02004     DMDrawOption draw_option;
02005     int i, totface, gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
02006     int gridFaces = gridSize - 1;
02007 
02008     (void) compareDrawOptions;
02009 
02010     ccgdm_pbvh_update(ccgdm);
02011 
02012     if (!mcol)
02013         mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MCOL);
02014 
02015     if (!mcol)
02016         mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_TEXTURE_MCOL);
02017 
02018     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
02019     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
02020         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
02021         int S, x, y, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02022         int drawSmooth, index = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
02023         int origIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
02024         unsigned char *cp = NULL;
02025         int mat_nr;
02026 
02027         if (faceFlags) {
02028             drawSmooth = (faceFlags[origIndex].flag & ME_SMOOTH);
02029             mat_nr = faceFlags[origIndex].mat_nr;
02030         }
02031         else {
02032             drawSmooth = 1;
02033             mat_nr = 0;
02034         }
02035 
02036         if (drawParams)
02037             draw_option = drawParams(tf, (mcol != NULL), mat_nr);
02038         else if (index != ORIGINDEX_NONE)
02039             draw_option = (drawParamsMapped) ? drawParamsMapped(userData, index) : DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
02040         else
02041             draw_option = GPU_enable_material(mat_nr, NULL) ? DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL : DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP;
02042 
02043 
02044         if (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
02045             if (tf) tf += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts;
02046             if (mcol) mcol += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts * 4;
02047             continue;
02048         }
02049 
02050         /* flag 1 == use vertex colors */
02051         if (mcol) {
02052             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_NO_MCOL)
02053                 cp = (unsigned char *)mcol;
02054             mcol += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts * 4;
02055         }
02056 
02057         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
02058             DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
02059             DMGridData *a, *b;
02060 
02061             if (drawSmooth) {
02062                 glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
02063                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
02064                     glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
02065                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
02066                         a = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
02067                         b = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
02068 
02069                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[0]);
02070                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
02071                         glNormal3fv(a->no);
02072                         glVertex3fv(a->co);
02073 
02074                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[1]);
02075                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
02076                         glNormal3fv(b->no);
02077                         glVertex3fv(b->co);
02078                         
02079                         if (x != gridFaces - 1) {
02080                             if (tf) tf++;
02081                             if (cp) cp += 16;
02082                         }
02083                     }
02084 
02085                     a = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
02086                     b = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
02087 
02088                     if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[3]);
02089                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
02090                     glNormal3fv(a->no);
02091                     glVertex3fv(a->co);
02092 
02093                     if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[2]);
02094                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
02095                     glNormal3fv(b->no);
02096                     glVertex3fv(b->co);
02097 
02098                     if (tf) tf++;
02099                     if (cp) cp += 16;
02100 
02101                     glEnd();
02102                 }
02103             }
02104             else {
02105                 glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
02106                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
02107                 for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
02108                     for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
02109                         float *a_co = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x].co;
02110                         float *b_co = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
02111                         float *c_co = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
02112                         float *d_co = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x].co;
02113 
02114                         ccgDM_glNormalFast(a_co, b_co, c_co, d_co);
02115 
02116                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[1]);
02117                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
02118                         glVertex3fv(d_co);
02119 
02120                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[2]);
02121                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
02122                         glVertex3fv(c_co);
02123 
02124                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[3]);
02125                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
02126                         glVertex3fv(b_co);
02127 
02128                         if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[0]);
02129                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
02130                         glVertex3fv(a_co);
02131 
02132                         if (tf) tf++;
02133                         if (cp) cp += 16;
02134                     }
02135                 }
02136                 glEnd();
02137             }
02138         }
02139     }
02140 }
02141 
02142 static void ccgDM_drawFacesTex(DerivedMesh *dm,
02143                                DMSetDrawOptionsTex setDrawOptions,
02144                                DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
02145                                void *userData)
02146 {
02147     ccgDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, setDrawOptions, NULL, compareDrawOptions, userData);
02148 }

02150 static void ccgDM_drawMappedFacesTex(DerivedMesh *dm,
02151                                      DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
02152                                      DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
02153                                      void *userData)
02154 {
02155     ccgDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, NULL, setDrawOptions, compareDrawOptions, userData);

02157 
02158 static void ccgDM_drawUVEdges(DerivedMesh *dm)
02159 {
02160 
02161     MFace *mf = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
02162     MTFace *tf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE);
02163     int i;
02164     
02165     if (tf) {
02166         glBegin(GL_LINES);
02167         for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, mf++, tf++) {
02168             if (!(mf->flag & ME_HIDE)) {
02169                 glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
02170                 glVertex2fv(tf->uv[1]);
02171     
02172                 glVertex2fv(tf->uv[1]);
02173                 glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
02174     
02175                 if (!mf->v4) {
02176                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
02177                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
02178                 }
02179                 else {
02180                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
02181                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[3]);
02182     
02183                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[3]);
02184                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
02185                 }
02186             }
02187         }
02188         glEnd();
02189     }
02190 }
02191 
02192 static void ccgDM_drawMappedFaces(DerivedMesh *dm,
02193                                   DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
02194                                   DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
02195                                   DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
02196                                   void *userData, DMDrawFlag flag)
02197 {
02198     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02199     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02200     MCol *mcol = NULL;
02201     int i, gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
02202     DMFlagMat *faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags;
02203     int useColors = flag & DM_DRAW_USE_COLORS;
02204     int gridFaces = gridSize - 1, totface;
02205 
02206     /* currently unused -- each original face is handled separately */
02207     (void)compareDrawOptions;
02208 
02209     if (useColors) {
02210         mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
02211         if (!mcol)
02212             mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MCOL);
02213     }
02214 
02215     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
02216     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
02217         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[i].face;
02218         int S, x, y, numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02219         int drawSmooth, index = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
02220         int origIndex;
02221         unsigned char *cp = NULL;
02222 
02223         origIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
02224 
02225         if (flag & DM_DRAW_ALWAYS_SMOOTH) drawSmooth = 1;
02226         else if (faceFlags) drawSmooth = (faceFlags[origIndex].flag & ME_SMOOTH);
02227         else drawSmooth = 1;
02228 
02229         if (mcol) {
02230             cp = (unsigned char *)mcol;
02231             mcol += gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts * 4;
02232         }
02233 
02234         {
02235             DMDrawOption draw_option = DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
02236 
02237             if (index == ORIGINDEX_NONE)
02238                 draw_option = setMaterial(faceFlags ? faceFlags[origIndex].mat_nr + 1 : 1, NULL);  /* XXX, no faceFlags no material */
02239             else if (setDrawOptions)
02240                 draw_option = setDrawOptions(userData, index);
02241 
02242             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
02243                 if (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE) {
02244                     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
02245                     glPolygonStipple(stipple_quarttone);
02246                 }
02247 
02248                 /* no need to set shading mode to flat because
02249                  *  normals are already used to change shading */
02250                 glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
02251                 
02252                 for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++) {
02253                     DMGridData *faceGridData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
02254                     if (drawSmooth) {
02255                         for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
02256                             DMGridData *a, *b;
02257                             glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
02258                             for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
02259                                 a = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
02260                                 b = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
02261     
02262                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
02263                                 glNormal3fv(a->no);
02264                                 glVertex3fv(a->co);
02265                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
02266                                 glNormal3fv(b->no);
02267                                 glVertex3fv(b->co);
02268 
02269                                 if (x != gridFaces - 1) {
02270                                     if (cp) cp += 16;
02271                                 }
02272                             }
02273 
02274                             a = &faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x];
02275                             b = &faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x];
02276 
02277                             if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
02278                             glNormal3fv(a->no);
02279                             glVertex3fv(a->co);
02280                             if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
02281                             glNormal3fv(b->no);
02282                             glVertex3fv(b->co);
02283 
02284                             if (cp) cp += 16;
02285 
02286                             glEnd();
02287                         }
02288                     }
02289                     else {
02290                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
02291                         for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
02292                             for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
02293                                 float *a = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x].co;
02294                                 float *b = faceGridData[(y + 0) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
02295                                 float *c = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x + 1].co;
02296                                 float *d = faceGridData[(y + 1) * gridSize + x].co;
02297 
02298                                 ccgDM_glNormalFast(a, b, c, d);
02299     
02300                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
02301                                 glVertex3fv(d);
02302                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
02303                                 glVertex3fv(c);
02304                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
02305                                 glVertex3fv(b);
02306                                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
02307                                 glVertex3fv(a);
02308 
02309                                 if (cp) cp += 16;
02310                             }
02311                         }
02312                         glEnd();
02313                     }
02314                 }
02315                 if (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE)
02316                     glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
02317             }
02318         }
02319     }
02320 }
02321 
02322 static void ccgDM_drawMappedEdges(DerivedMesh *dm,
02323                                   DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
02324                                   void *userData)
02325 {
02326     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02327     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02328     CCGEdgeIterator *ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
02329     int i, useAging, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
02330 
02331     ccgSubSurf_getUseAgeCounts(ss, &useAging, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02332 
02333     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
02334         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
02335         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
02336         int index = ccgDM_getEdgeMapIndex(ss, e);
02337 
02338         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
02339         if (index != -1 && (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, index) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP))) {
02340             if (useAging && !(G.f & G_BACKBUFSEL)) {
02341                 int ageCol = 255 - ccgSubSurf_getEdgeAge(ss, e) * 4;
02342                 glColor3ub(0, ageCol > 0 ? ageCol : 0, 0);
02343             }
02344 
02345             for (i = 0; i < edgeSize - 1; i++) {
02346                 glVertex3fv(edgeData[i].co);
02347                 glVertex3fv(edgeData[i + 1].co);
02348             }
02349         }
02350         glEnd();
02351     }
02352 
02353     ccgEdgeIterator_free(ei);
02354 }
02355 
02356 static void ccgDM_drawMappedEdgesInterp(DerivedMesh *dm,
02357                                         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
02358                                         DMSetDrawInterpOptions setDrawInterpOptions,
02359                                         void *userData)
02360 {
02361     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02362     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02363     CCGEdgeIterator *ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
02364     int i, useAging, edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
02365 
02366     ccgSubSurf_getUseAgeCounts(ss, &useAging, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02367 
02368     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
02369         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
02370         DMGridData *edgeData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeDataArray(ss, e);
02371         int index = ccgDM_getEdgeMapIndex(ss, e);
02372 
02373         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
02374         if (index != -1 && (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, index) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP))) {
02375             for (i = 0; i < edgeSize; i++) {
02376                 setDrawInterpOptions(userData, index, (float) i / (edgeSize - 1));
02377 
02378                 if (useAging && !(G.f & G_BACKBUFSEL)) {
02379                     int ageCol = 255 - ccgSubSurf_getEdgeAge(ss, e) * 4;
02380                     glColor3ub(0, ageCol > 0 ? ageCol : 0, 0);
02381                 }
02382 
02383                 glVertex3fv(edgeData[i].co);
02384             }
02385         }
02386         glEnd();
02387     }
02388 
02389     ccgEdgeIterator_free(ei);
02390 }
02391 
02392 static void ccgDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter(
02393     DerivedMesh *dm,
02394     void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float co[3], const float no[3]),
02395     void *userData)
02396 {
02397     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02398     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02399     CCGFaceIterator *fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(ss);
02400 
02401     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
02402         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
02403         int index = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
02404 
02405         if (index != -1) {
02406             /* Face center data normal isn't updated atm. */
02407             DMGridData *vd = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, 0, 0, 0);
02408 
02409             func(userData, index, vd->co, vd->no);
02410         }
02411     }
02412 
02413     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
02414 }
02415 
02416 static void ccgDM_release(DerivedMesh *dm)
02417 {
02418     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *) dm;
02419 
02420     if (DM_release(dm)) {
02421         /* Before freeing, need to update the displacement map */
02422         if (ccgdm->multires.modified_flags) {
02423             /* Check that mmd still exists */
02424             if (!ccgdm->multires.local_mmd &&
02425                 BLI_findindex(&ccgdm->multires.ob->modifiers, ccgdm->multires.mmd) < 0)
02426                 ccgdm->multires.mmd = NULL;
02427             
02428             if (ccgdm->multires.mmd) {
02429                 if (ccgdm->multires.modified_flags & MULTIRES_COORDS_MODIFIED)
02430                     multires_modifier_update_mdisps(dm);
02431                 if (ccgdm->multires.modified_flags & MULTIRES_HIDDEN_MODIFIED)
02432                     multires_modifier_update_hidden(dm);
02433             }
02434         }
02435 
02436         if (ccgdm->ehash)
02437             BLI_edgehash_free(ccgdm->ehash, NULL);
02438 
02439         if (ccgdm->reverseFaceMap) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->reverseFaceMap);
02440         if (ccgdm->gridFaces) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridFaces);
02441         if (ccgdm->gridData) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridData);
02442         if (ccgdm->gridAdjacency) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridAdjacency);
02443         if (ccgdm->gridOffset) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridOffset);
02444         if (ccgdm->gridFlagMats) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridFlagMats);
02445         if (ccgdm->gridHidden) {
02446             int i, numGrids = dm->getNumGrids(dm);
02447             for (i = 0; i < numGrids; i++) {
02448                 if (ccgdm->gridHidden[i])
02449                     MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridHidden[i]);
02450             }
02451             MEM_freeN(ccgdm->gridHidden);
02452         }
02453         if (ccgdm->freeSS) ccgSubSurf_free(ccgdm->ss);
02454         if (ccgdm->pmap) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->pmap);
02455         if (ccgdm->pmap_mem) MEM_freeN(ccgdm->pmap_mem);
02456         MEM_freeN(ccgdm->edgeFlags);
02457         MEM_freeN(ccgdm->faceFlags);
02458         MEM_freeN(ccgdm->vertMap);
02459         MEM_freeN(ccgdm->edgeMap);
02460         MEM_freeN(ccgdm->faceMap);
02461         MEM_freeN(ccgdm);
02462     }
02463 }
02464 
02465 static void ccg_loops_to_corners(CustomData *fdata, CustomData *ldata, 
02466                                  CustomData *pdata, int loopstart, int findex,  int polyindex,
02467                                  const int numTex, const int numCol, const int hasPCol, const int hasOrigSpace)
02468 {
02469     MTFace *texface;
02470     MTexPoly *texpoly;
02471     MCol *mcol;
02472     MLoopCol *mloopcol;
02473     MLoopUV *mloopuv;
02474     int i, j;
02475 
02476     for (i = 0; i < numTex; i++) {
02477         texface = CustomData_get_n(fdata, CD_MTFACE, findex, i);
02478         texpoly = CustomData_get_n(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, polyindex, i);
02479         
02480         ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(texface, texpoly);
02481 
02482         mloopuv = CustomData_get_n(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, loopstart, i);
02483         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++, mloopuv++) {
02484             copy_v2_v2(texface->uv[j], mloopuv->uv);
02485         }
02486     }
02487 
02488     for (i = 0; i < numCol; i++) {
02489         mloopcol = CustomData_get_n(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, loopstart, i);
02490         mcol = CustomData_get_n(fdata, CD_MCOL, findex, i);
02491 
02492         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++, mloopcol++) {
02493             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
02494         }
02495     }
02496     
02497     if (hasPCol) {
02498         mloopcol = CustomData_get(ldata, loopstart, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
02499         mcol = CustomData_get(fdata, findex, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
02500 
02501         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++, mloopcol++) {
02502             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
02503         }
02504     }
02505 
02506     if (hasOrigSpace) {
02507         OrigSpaceFace *of = CustomData_get(fdata, findex, CD_ORIGSPACE);
02508         OrigSpaceLoop *lof;
02509 
02510         lof = CustomData_get(ldata, loopstart, CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP);
02511         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++, lof++) {
02512             copy_v2_v2(of->uv[j], lof->uv);
02513         }
02514     }
02515 }
02516 
02517 static void *ccgDM_get_vert_data_layer(DerivedMesh *dm, int type)
02518 {
02519     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02520         /* create origindex on demand to save memory */
02521         CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02522         CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02523         int *origindex;
02524         int a, index, totnone, totorig;
02525 
02526         /* Avoid re-creation if the layer exists already */
02527         origindex = DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02528         if (origindex) {
02529             return origindex;
02530         }
02531 
02532         DM_add_vert_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
02533         origindex = DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02534 
02535         totorig = ccgSubSurf_getNumVerts(ss);
02536         totnone = dm->numVertData - totorig;
02537 
02538         /* original vertices are at the end */
02539         for (a = 0; a < totnone; a++)
02540             origindex[a] = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
02541 
02542         for (index = 0; index < totorig; index++, a++) {
02543             CCGVert *v = ccgdm->vertMap[index].vert;
02544             origindex[a] = ccgDM_getVertMapIndex(ccgdm->ss, v);
02545         }
02546 
02547         return origindex;
02548     }
02549 
02550     return DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, type);
02551 }
02552 
02553 static void *ccgDM_get_edge_data_layer(DerivedMesh *dm, int type)
02554 {
02555     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02556         /* create origindex on demand to save memory */
02557         CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02558         CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02559         int *origindex;
02560         int a, i, index, totnone, totorig, totedge;
02561         int edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
02562 
02563         /* Avoid re-creation if the layer exists already */
02564         origindex = DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02565         if (origindex) {
02566             return origindex;
02567         }
02568 
02569         DM_add_edge_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
02570         origindex = DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02571 
02572         totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
02573         totorig = totedge * (edgeSize - 1);
02574         totnone = dm->numEdgeData - totorig;
02575 
02576         /* original edges are at the end */
02577         for (a = 0; a < totnone; a++)
02578             origindex[a] = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
02579 
02580         for (index = 0; index < totedge; index++) {
02581             CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[index].edge;
02582             int mapIndex = ccgDM_getEdgeMapIndex(ss, e);
02583 
02584             for (i = 0; i < edgeSize - 1; i++, a++)
02585                 origindex[a] = mapIndex;
02586         }
02587 
02588         return origindex;
02589     }
02590 
02591     return DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, type);
02592 }
02593 
02594 static void *ccgDM_get_tessface_data_layer(DerivedMesh *dm, int type)
02595 {
02596     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02597         /* create origindex on demand to save memory */
02598         CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02599         CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02600         int *origindex;
02601         int a, i, index, totface;
02602         int gridFaces = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss) - 1;
02603 
02604         /* Avoid re-creation if the layer exists already */
02605         origindex = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02606         if (origindex) {
02607             return origindex;
02608         }
02609 
02610         DM_add_tessface_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
02611         origindex = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02612 
02613         totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
02614 
02615         for (a = 0, index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
02616             CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
02617             int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02618             int mapIndex = ccgDM_getFaceMapIndex(ss, f);
02619 
02620             for (i = 0; i < gridFaces * gridFaces * numVerts; i++, a++)
02621                 origindex[a] = mapIndex;
02622         }
02623 
02624         return origindex;
02625     }
02626 
02627     return DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
02628 }
02629 
02630 static void *ccgDM_get_vert_data(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, int type)
02631 {
02632     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02633         /* ensure creation of CD_ORIGINDEX layer */
02634         ccgDM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, type);
02635     }
02636 
02637     return DM_get_vert_data(dm, index, type);
02638 }
02639 
02640 static void *ccgDM_get_edge_data(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, int type)
02641 {
02642     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02643         /* ensure creation of CD_ORIGINDEX layer */
02644         ccgDM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, type);
02645     }
02646 
02647     return DM_get_edge_data(dm, index, type);
02648 }
02649 
02650 static void *ccgDM_get_tessface_data(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, int type)
02651 {
02652     if (type == CD_ORIGINDEX) {
02653         /* ensure creation of CD_ORIGINDEX layer */
02654         ccgDM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
02655     }
02656 
02657     return DM_get_tessface_data(dm, index, type);
02658 }
02659 
02660 static int ccgDM_getNumGrids(DerivedMesh *dm)
02661 {
02662     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02663     int index, numFaces, numGrids;
02664 
02665     numFaces = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ccgdm->ss);
02666     numGrids = 0;
02667 
02668     for (index = 0; index < numFaces; index++) {
02669         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
02670         numGrids += ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02671     }
02672 
02673     return numGrids;
02674 }
02675 
02676 static int ccgDM_getGridSize(DerivedMesh *dm)
02677 {
02678     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02679     return ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ccgdm->ss);
02680 }
02681 
02682 static int ccgdm_adjacent_grid(int *gridOffset, CCGFace *f, int S, int offset)
02683 {
02684     CCGFace *adjf;
02685     CCGEdge *e;
02686     int i, j = 0, numFaces, fIndex, numEdges = 0;
02687 
02688     e = ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(f, S);
02689     numFaces = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeNumFaces(e);
02690 
02691     if (numFaces != 2)
02692         return -1;
02693 
02694     for (i = 0; i < numFaces; i++) {
02695         adjf = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeFace(e, i);
02696 
02697         if (adjf != f) {
02698             numEdges = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(adjf);
02699             for (j = 0; j < numEdges; j++)
02700                 if (ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(adjf, j) == e)
02701                     break;
02702 
02703             if (j != numEdges)
02704                 break;
02705         }
02706     }
02707 
02708     if (numEdges == 0)
02709         return -1;
02710     
02711     fIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(adjf));
02712 
02713     return gridOffset[fIndex] + (j + offset) % numEdges;
02714 }
02715 
02716 static void ccgdm_create_grids(DerivedMesh *dm)
02717 {
02718     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02719     CCGSubSurf *ss = ccgdm->ss;
02720     DMGridData **gridData;
02721     DMGridAdjacency *gridAdjacency, *adj;
02722     DMFlagMat *gridFlagMats;
02723     CCGFace **gridFaces;
02724     int *gridOffset;
02725     int index, numFaces, numGrids, S, gIndex /*, gridSize*/;
02726 
02727     if (ccgdm->gridData)
02728         return;
02729     
02730     numGrids = ccgDM_getNumGrids(dm);
02731     numFaces = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
02732     /*gridSize = ccgDM_getGridSize(dm);*/  /*UNUSED*/
02733 
02734     /* compute offset into grid array for each face */
02735     gridOffset = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numFaces, "ccgdm.gridOffset");
02736 
02737     for (gIndex = 0, index = 0; index < numFaces; index++) {
02738         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
02739         int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02740 
02741         gridOffset[index] = gIndex;
02742         gIndex += numVerts;
02743     }
02744 
02745     /* compute grid data */
02746     gridData = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(DMGridData *) * numGrids, "ccgdm.gridData");
02747     gridAdjacency = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(DMGridAdjacency) * numGrids, "ccgdm.gridAdjacency");
02748     gridFaces = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(CCGFace *) * numGrids, "ccgdm.gridFaces");
02749     gridFlagMats = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(DMFlagMat) * numGrids, "ccgdm.gridFlagMats");
02750 
02751     ccgdm->gridHidden = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BLI_bitmap) * numGrids, "ccgdm.gridHidden");
02752 
02753     for (gIndex = 0, index = 0; index < numFaces; index++) {
02754         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
02755         int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
02756 
02757         for (S = 0; S < numVerts; S++, gIndex++) {
02758             int prevS = (S - 1 + numVerts) % numVerts;
02759             int nextS = (S + 1 + numVerts) % numVerts;
02760 
02761             gridData[gIndex] = ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(ss, f, S);
02762             gridFaces[gIndex] = f;
02763             gridFlagMats[gIndex] = ccgdm->faceFlags[index];
02764 
02765             adj = &gridAdjacency[gIndex];
02766 
02767             adj->index[0] = gIndex - S + nextS;
02768             adj->rotation[0] = 3;
02769             adj->index[1] = ccgdm_adjacent_grid(gridOffset, f, prevS, 0);
02770             adj->rotation[1] = 1;
02771             adj->index[2] = ccgdm_adjacent_grid(gridOffset, f, S, 1);
02772             adj->rotation[2] = 3;
02773             adj->index[3] = gIndex - S + prevS;
02774             adj->rotation[3] = 1;
02775         }
02776     }
02777 
02778     ccgdm->gridData = gridData;
02779     ccgdm->gridFaces = gridFaces;
02780     ccgdm->gridAdjacency = gridAdjacency;
02781     ccgdm->gridOffset = gridOffset;
02782     ccgdm->gridFlagMats = gridFlagMats;
02783 }
02784 
02785 static DMGridData **ccgDM_getGridData(DerivedMesh *dm)
02786 {
02787     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02788 
02789     ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02790     return ccgdm->gridData;
02791 }
02792 
02793 static DMGridAdjacency *ccgDM_getGridAdjacency(DerivedMesh *dm)
02794 {
02795     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02796 
02797     ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02798     return ccgdm->gridAdjacency;
02799 }
02800 
02801 static int *ccgDM_getGridOffset(DerivedMesh *dm)
02802 {
02803     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02804 
02805     ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02806     return ccgdm->gridOffset;
02807 }
02808 
02809 static DMFlagMat *ccgDM_getGridFlagMats(DerivedMesh *dm)
02810 {
02811     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02812     
02813     ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02814     return ccgdm->gridFlagMats;
02815 }
02816 
02817 static BLI_bitmap *ccgDM_getGridHidden(DerivedMesh *dm)
02818 {
02819     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02820     
02821     ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02822     return ccgdm->gridHidden;
02823 }
02824 
02825 static const MeshElemMap *ccgDM_getPolyMap(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
02826 {
02827     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02828 
02829     if (!ccgdm->multires.mmd && !ccgdm->pmap && ob->type == OB_MESH) {
02830         Mesh *me = ob->data;
02831 
02832         create_vert_poly_map(&ccgdm->pmap, &ccgdm->pmap_mem,
02833                              me->mpoly, me->mloop,
02834                              me->totvert, me->totpoly, me->totloop);
02835     }
02836 
02837     return ccgdm->pmap;
02838 }
02839 
02840 static int ccgDM_use_grid_pbvh(CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm)
02841 {
02842     MultiresModifierData *mmd = ccgdm->multires.mmd;
02843 
02844     /* both of multires and subsurf modifiers are CCG, but
02845      * grids should only be used when sculpting on multires */
02846     if (!mmd)
02847         return 0;
02848 
02849     return 1;
02850 }
02851 
02852 static struct PBVH *ccgDM_getPBVH(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
02853 {
02854     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = (CCGDerivedMesh *)dm;
02855     int gridSize, numGrids, grid_pbvh;
02856 
02857     if (!ob) {
02858         ccgdm->pbvh = NULL;
02859         return NULL;
02860     }
02861 
02862     if (!ob->sculpt)
02863         return NULL;
02864 
02865     grid_pbvh = ccgDM_use_grid_pbvh(ccgdm);
02866 
02867     if (ob->sculpt->pbvh) {
02868         if (grid_pbvh) {
02869             /* pbvh's grids, gridadj and gridfaces points to data inside ccgdm
02870              * but this can be freed on ccgdm release, this updates the pointers
02871              * when the ccgdm gets remade, the assumption is that the topology
02872              * does not change. */
02873             ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02874             BLI_pbvh_grids_update(ob->sculpt->pbvh, ccgdm->gridData, ccgdm->gridAdjacency, (void **)ccgdm->gridFaces);
02875         }
02876 
02877         ccgdm->pbvh = ob->sculpt->pbvh;
02878     }
02879 
02880     if (ccgdm->pbvh)
02881         return ccgdm->pbvh;
02882 
02883     /* no pbvh exists yet, we need to create one. only in case of multires
02884      * we build a pbvh over the modified mesh, in other cases the base mesh
02885      * is being sculpted, so we build a pbvh from that. */
02886     if (grid_pbvh) {
02887         ccgdm_create_grids(dm);
02888 
02889         gridSize = ccgDM_getGridSize(dm);
02890         numGrids = ccgDM_getNumGrids(dm);
02891 
02892         ob->sculpt->pbvh = ccgdm->pbvh = BLI_pbvh_new();
02893         BLI_pbvh_build_grids(ccgdm->pbvh, ccgdm->gridData, ccgdm->gridAdjacency,
02894                              numGrids, gridSize, (void **)ccgdm->gridFaces, ccgdm->gridFlagMats, ccgdm->gridHidden);
02895     }
02896     else if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
02897         Mesh *me = ob->data;
02898         ob->sculpt->pbvh = ccgdm->pbvh = BLI_pbvh_new();
02899         BLI_assert(!(me->mface == NULL && me->mpoly != NULL)); /* BMESH ONLY complain if mpoly is valid but not mface */
02900         BLI_pbvh_build_mesh(ccgdm->pbvh, me->mface, me->mvert,
02901                             me->totface, me->totvert);
02902     }
02903 
02904     return ccgdm->pbvh;
02905 }
02906 
02907 static void ccgDM_recalcTessellation(DerivedMesh *UNUSED(dm))
02908 {
02909     /* Nothing to do: CCG handles creating its own tessfaces */
02910 }
02911 
02912 static void ccgDM_calcNormals(DerivedMesh *UNUSED(dm))
02913 {
02914     /* Nothing to do: CCG calculates normals during drawing */
02915 }
02916 
02917 static CCGDerivedMesh *getCCGDerivedMesh(CCGSubSurf *ss,
02918                                          int drawInteriorEdges,
02919                                          int useSubsurfUv,
02920                                          DerivedMesh *dm)
02921 {
02922     CCGDerivedMesh *ccgdm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*ccgdm), "ccgdm");
02923     CCGVertIterator *vi;
02924     CCGEdgeIterator *ei;
02925     CCGFaceIterator *fi;
02926     int index, totvert, totedge, totface;
02927     int i;
02928     int vertNum, edgeNum, faceNum;
02929     int *vertOrigIndex, *faceOrigIndex, *polyOrigIndex, *base_polyOrigIndex; /* *edgeOrigIndex - as yet, unused  */
02930     short *edgeFlags;
02931     DMFlagMat *faceFlags;
02932     int *loopidx = NULL, *vertidx = NULL, *polyidx = NULL;
02933     BLI_array_declare(loopidx);
02934     BLI_array_declare(vertidx);
02935     int loopindex, loopindex2;
02936     int edgeSize, has_edge_origindex;
02937     int gridSize;
02938     int gridFaces, gridCuts;
02939     /*int gridSideVerts;*/
02940     int gridSideEdges;
02941     int numTex, numCol;
02942     int hasPCol, hasOrigSpace;
02943     int gridInternalEdges;
02944     float *w = NULL;
02945     WeightTable wtable = {0};
02946     /* MCol *mcol; */ /* UNUSED */
02947     MEdge *medge = NULL;
02948     /* MFace *mface = NULL; */
02949     MPoly *mpoly = NULL;
02950 
02951     DM_from_template(&ccgdm->dm, dm, DM_TYPE_CCGDM,
02952                      ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalVerts(ss),
02953                      ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalEdges(ss),
02954                      ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss),
02955                      ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss) * 4,
02956                      ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss));
02957 
02958     CustomData_free_layer_active(&ccgdm->dm.polyData, CD_NORMAL,
02959                                  ccgdm->dm.numPolyData);
02960     
02961     numTex = CustomData_number_of_layers(&ccgdm->dm.loopData, CD_MLOOPUV);
02962     numCol = CustomData_number_of_layers(&ccgdm->dm.loopData, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02963     hasPCol = CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.loopData, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
02964     hasOrigSpace = CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.loopData, CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP);
02965     
02966     if (
02967         (numTex && CustomData_number_of_layers(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_MTFACE) != numTex)  ||
02968         (numCol && CustomData_number_of_layers(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_MCOL) != numCol)    ||
02969         (hasPCol && !CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL))            ||
02970         (hasOrigSpace && !CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_ORIGSPACE)) )
02971     {
02972         CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(&ccgdm->dm.faceData,
02973                                   &ccgdm->dm.polyData,
02974                                   &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
02975                                   ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss));
02976     }
02977 
02978     /* We absolutely need that layer, else it's no valid tessellated data! */
02979     polyidx = CustomData_add_layer(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_POLYINDEX, CD_CALLOC,
02980                                    NULL, ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss));
02981 
02982     ccgdm->dm.getMinMax = ccgDM_getMinMax;
02983     ccgdm->dm.getNumVerts = ccgDM_getNumVerts;
02984     ccgdm->dm.getNumEdges = ccgDM_getNumEdges;
02985     ccgdm->dm.getNumTessFaces = ccgDM_getNumTessFaces;
02986     ccgdm->dm.getNumLoops = ccgDM_getNumLoops;
02987     /* reuse of ccgDM_getNumTessFaces is intentional here: subsurf polys are just created from tessfaces */
02988     ccgdm->dm.getNumPolys = ccgDM_getNumTessFaces;
02989 
02990     ccgdm->dm.getNumGrids = ccgDM_getNumGrids;
02991     ccgdm->dm.getPBVH = ccgDM_getPBVH;
02992 
02993     ccgdm->dm.getVert = ccgDM_getFinalVert;
02994     ccgdm->dm.getEdge = ccgDM_getFinalEdge;
02995     ccgdm->dm.getTessFace = ccgDM_getFinalFace;
02996     ccgdm->dm.getVertCo = ccgDM_getFinalVertCo;
02997     ccgdm->dm.getVertNo = ccgDM_getFinalVertNo;
02998     ccgdm->dm.copyVertArray = ccgDM_copyFinalVertArray;
02999     ccgdm->dm.copyEdgeArray = ccgDM_copyFinalEdgeArray;
03000     ccgdm->dm.copyTessFaceArray = ccgDM_copyFinalFaceArray;
03001     ccgdm->dm.copyLoopArray = ccgDM_copyFinalLoopArray;
03002     ccgdm->dm.copyPolyArray = ccgDM_copyFinalPolyArray;
03003 
03004     ccgdm->dm.getVertData = ccgDM_get_vert_data;
03005     ccgdm->dm.getEdgeData = ccgDM_get_edge_data;
03006     ccgdm->dm.getTessFaceData = ccgDM_get_tessface_data;
03007     ccgdm->dm.getVertDataArray = ccgDM_get_vert_data_layer;
03008     ccgdm->dm.getEdgeDataArray = ccgDM_get_edge_data_layer;
03009     ccgdm->dm.getTessFaceDataArray = ccgDM_get_tessface_data_layer;
03010     ccgdm->dm.getNumGrids = ccgDM_getNumGrids;
03011     ccgdm->dm.getGridSize = ccgDM_getGridSize;
03012     ccgdm->dm.getGridData = ccgDM_getGridData;
03013     ccgdm->dm.getGridAdjacency = ccgDM_getGridAdjacency;
03014     ccgdm->dm.getGridOffset = ccgDM_getGridOffset;
03015     ccgdm->dm.getGridFlagMats = ccgDM_getGridFlagMats;
03016     ccgdm->dm.getGridHidden = ccgDM_getGridHidden;
03017     ccgdm->dm.getPolyMap = ccgDM_getPolyMap;
03018     ccgdm->dm.getPBVH = ccgDM_getPBVH;
03019 
03020     ccgdm->dm.getTessFace = ccgDM_getFinalFace;
03021     ccgdm->dm.copyVertArray = ccgDM_copyFinalVertArray;
03022     ccgdm->dm.copyEdgeArray = ccgDM_copyFinalEdgeArray;
03023     ccgdm->dm.copyTessFaceArray = ccgDM_copyFinalFaceArray;
03024 
03025     ccgdm->dm.calcNormals = ccgDM_calcNormals;
03026     ccgdm->dm.recalcTessellation = ccgDM_recalcTessellation;
03027 
03028     ccgdm->dm.getVertCos = ccgdm_getVertCos;
03029     ccgdm->dm.foreachMappedVert = ccgDM_foreachMappedVert;
03030     ccgdm->dm.foreachMappedEdge = ccgDM_foreachMappedEdge;
03031     ccgdm->dm.foreachMappedFaceCenter = ccgDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter;
03032     
03033     ccgdm->dm.drawVerts = ccgDM_drawVerts;
03034     ccgdm->dm.drawEdges = ccgDM_drawEdges;
03035     ccgdm->dm.drawLooseEdges = ccgDM_drawLooseEdges;
03036     ccgdm->dm.drawFacesSolid = ccgDM_drawFacesSolid;
03037     ccgdm->dm.drawFacesTex = ccgDM_drawFacesTex;
03038     ccgdm->dm.drawFacesGLSL = ccgDM_drawFacesGLSL;
03039     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedFaces = ccgDM_drawMappedFaces;
03040     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedFacesTex = ccgDM_drawMappedFacesTex;
03041     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedFacesGLSL = ccgDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL;
03042     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedFacesMat = ccgDM_drawMappedFacesMat;
03043     ccgdm->dm.drawUVEdges = ccgDM_drawUVEdges;
03044 
03045     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedEdgesInterp = ccgDM_drawMappedEdgesInterp;
03046     ccgdm->dm.drawMappedEdges = ccgDM_drawMappedEdges;
03047     
03048     ccgdm->dm.release = ccgDM_release;
03049     
03050     ccgdm->ss = ss;
03051     ccgdm->drawInteriorEdges = drawInteriorEdges;
03052     ccgdm->useSubsurfUv = useSubsurfUv;
03053 
03054     totvert = ccgSubSurf_getNumVerts(ss);
03055     ccgdm->vertMap = MEM_mallocN(totvert * sizeof(*ccgdm->vertMap), "vertMap");
03056     vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ss);
03057     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
03058         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
03059 
03060         ccgdm->vertMap[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v))].vert = v;
03061     }
03062     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
03063 
03064     totedge = ccgSubSurf_getNumEdges(ss);
03065     ccgdm->edgeMap = MEM_mallocN(totedge * sizeof(*ccgdm->edgeMap), "edgeMap");
03066     ei = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeIterator(ss);
03067     for (; !ccgEdgeIterator_isStopped(ei); ccgEdgeIterator_next(ei)) {
03068         CCGEdge *e = ccgEdgeIterator_getCurrent(ei);
03069 
03070         ccgdm->edgeMap[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeEdgeHandle(e))].edge = e;
03071     }
03072 
03073     totface = ccgSubSurf_getNumFaces(ss);
03074     ccgdm->faceMap = MEM_mallocN(totface * sizeof(*ccgdm->faceMap), "faceMap");
03075     fi = ccgSubSurf_getFaceIterator(ss);
03076     for (; !ccgFaceIterator_isStopped(fi); ccgFaceIterator_next(fi)) {
03077         CCGFace *f = ccgFaceIterator_getCurrent(fi);
03078 
03079         ccgdm->faceMap[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f))].face = f;
03080     }
03081     ccgFaceIterator_free(fi);
03082 
03083     ccgdm->reverseFaceMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(ss), "reverseFaceMap");
03084 
03085     edgeSize = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeSize(ss);
03086     gridSize = ccgSubSurf_getGridSize(ss);
03087     gridFaces = gridSize - 1;
03088     gridCuts = gridSize - 2;
03089     /*gridInternalVerts = gridSideVerts * gridSideVerts; - as yet, unused */
03090     gridSideEdges = gridSize - 1;
03091     gridInternalEdges = (gridSideEdges - 1) * gridSideEdges * 2; 
03092 
03093     vertNum = 0;
03094     edgeNum = 0;
03095     faceNum = 0;
03096 
03097     /* mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm); */ /* UNUSED */
03098     medge = dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
03099     /* mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm); */ /* UNUSED */
03100 
03101     mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY);
03102     base_polyOrigIndex = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
03103     
03104     /*CDDM hack*/
03105     edgeFlags = ccgdm->edgeFlags = MEM_callocN(sizeof(short) * totedge, "edgeFlags");
03106     faceFlags = ccgdm->faceFlags = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DMFlagMat) * totface, "faceFlags");
03107 
03108     vertOrigIndex = DM_get_vert_data_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
03109     /*edgeOrigIndex = DM_get_edge_data_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);*/
03110     faceOrigIndex = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
03111 
03112     polyOrigIndex = DM_get_poly_data_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
03113 
03114 #if 0
03115     /* this is not in trunk, can gives problems because colors initialize
03116      * as black, just don't do it!, it works fine - campbell */
03117     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, CD_MCOL))
03118         DM_add_tessface_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_MCOL, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
03119     mcol = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(&ccgdm->dm, CD_MCOL);
03120 #endif
03121 
03122     has_edge_origindex = CustomData_has_layer(&ccgdm->dm.edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
03123 
03124 
03125     loopindex = loopindex2 = 0; //current loop index
03126     for (index = 0; index < totface; index++) {
03127         CCGFace *f = ccgdm->faceMap[index].face;
03128         int numVerts = ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(f);
03129         int numFinalEdges = numVerts * (gridSideEdges + gridInternalEdges);
03130         int origIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getFaceFaceHandle(f));
03131         int g2_wid = gridCuts + 2;
03132         float *w2;
03133         int s, x, y;
03134         
03135         origIndex = base_polyOrigIndex ? base_polyOrigIndex[origIndex] : origIndex;
03136         
03137         w = get_ss_weights(&wtable, gridCuts, numVerts);
03138 
03139         ccgdm->faceMap[index].startVert = vertNum;
03140         ccgdm->faceMap[index].startEdge = edgeNum;
03141         ccgdm->faceMap[index].startFace = faceNum;
03142         
03143         faceFlags->flag = mpoly ?  mpoly[origIndex].flag : 0;
03144         faceFlags->mat_nr = mpoly ? mpoly[origIndex].mat_nr : 0;
03145         faceFlags++;
03146 
03147         /* set the face base vert */
03148         *((int *)ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f)) = vertNum;
03149 
03150         BLI_array_empty(loopidx);
03151         BLI_array_growitems(loopidx, numVerts);
03152         for (s = 0; s < numVerts; s++) {
03153             loopidx[s] = loopindex++;
03154         }
03155         
03156         BLI_array_empty(vertidx);
03157         BLI_array_growitems(vertidx, numVerts);
03158         for (s = 0; s < numVerts; s++) {
03159             CCGVert *v = ccgSubSurf_getFaceVert(f, s);
03160             vertidx[s] = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v));
03161         }
03162         
03163 
03164         /*I think this is for interpolating the center vert?*/
03165         w2 = w; // + numVerts*(g2_wid-1)*(g2_wid-1); //numVerts*((g2_wid-1)*g2_wid+g2_wid-1);
03166         DM_interp_vert_data(dm, &ccgdm->dm, vertidx, w2,
03167                             numVerts, vertNum);
03168         if (vertOrigIndex) {
03169             *vertOrigIndex = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
03170             ++vertOrigIndex;
03171         }
03172 
03173         ++vertNum;
03174 
03175         /*interpolate per-vert data*/
03176         for (s = 0; s < numVerts; s++) {
03177             for (x = 1; x < gridFaces; x++) {
03178                 w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + x * numVerts;
03179                 DM_interp_vert_data(dm, &ccgdm->dm, vertidx, w2,
03180                                     numVerts, vertNum);
03181 
03182                 if (vertOrigIndex) {
03183                     *vertOrigIndex = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
03184                     ++vertOrigIndex;
03185                 }
03186 
03187                 ++vertNum;
03188             }
03189         }
03190 
03191         /*interpolate per-vert data*/
03192         for (s = 0; s < numVerts; s++) {
03193             for (y = 1; y < gridFaces; y++) {
03194                 for (x = 1; x < gridFaces; x++) {
03195                     w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + (y * g2_wid + x) * numVerts;
03196                     DM_interp_vert_data(dm, &ccgdm->dm, vertidx, w2,
03197                                         numVerts, vertNum);
03198 
03199                     if (vertOrigIndex) {
03200                         *vertOrigIndex = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
03201                         ++vertOrigIndex;
03202                     }
03203 
03204                     ++vertNum;
03205                 }
03206             }
03207         }
03208 
03209         if (has_edge_origindex) {
03210             for (i = 0; i < numFinalEdges; ++i)
03211                 *(int *)DM_get_edge_data(&ccgdm->dm, edgeNum + i,
03212                                          CD_ORIGINDEX) = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
03213         }
03214 
03215         for (s = 0; s < numVerts; s++) {
03216             /*interpolate per-face data*/
03217             for (y = 0; y < gridFaces; y++) {
03218                 for (x = 0; x < gridFaces; x++) {
03219                     w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + (y * g2_wid + x) * numVerts;
03220                     CustomData_interp(&dm->loopData, &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
03221                                       loopidx, w2, NULL, numVerts, loopindex2);
03222                     loopindex2++;
03223 
03224                     w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + ((y + 1) * g2_wid + (x)) * numVerts;
03225                     CustomData_interp(&dm->loopData, &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
03226                                       loopidx, w2, NULL, numVerts, loopindex2);
03227                     loopindex2++;
03228 
03229                     w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + ((y + 1) * g2_wid + (x + 1)) * numVerts;
03230                     CustomData_interp(&dm->loopData, &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
03231                                       loopidx, w2, NULL, numVerts, loopindex2);
03232                     loopindex2++;
03233                     
03234                     w2 = w + s * numVerts * g2_wid * g2_wid + ((y) * g2_wid + (x + 1)) * numVerts;
03235                     CustomData_interp(&dm->loopData, &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
03236                                       loopidx, w2, NULL, numVerts, loopindex2);
03237                     loopindex2++;
03238 
03239                     /*copy over poly data, e.g. mtexpoly*/
03240                     CustomData_copy_data(&dm->polyData, &ccgdm->dm.polyData, origIndex, faceNum, 1);
03241 
03242                     /*generate tessellated face data used for drawing*/
03243                     ccg_loops_to_corners(&ccgdm->dm.faceData, &ccgdm->dm.loopData,
03244                                          &ccgdm->dm.polyData, loopindex2 - 4, faceNum, faceNum,
03245                                          numTex, numCol, hasPCol, hasOrigSpace);
03246                     
03247                     /*set original index data*/
03248                     if (faceOrigIndex) {
03249                         *faceOrigIndex = origIndex;
03250                         faceOrigIndex++;
03251                     }
03252                     if (polyOrigIndex) {
03253                         *polyOrigIndex = origIndex;
03254                         polyOrigIndex++;
03255                     }
03256 
03257                     ccgdm->reverseFaceMap[faceNum] = index;
03258 
03259                     /* This is a simple one to one mapping, here... */
03260                     polyidx[faceNum] = faceNum;
03261 
03262                     faceNum++;
03263                 }
03264             }
03265         }
03266 
03267         edgeNum += numFinalEdges;
03268     }
03269 
03270     for (index = 0; index < totedge; ++index) {
03271         CCGEdge *e = ccgdm->edgeMap[index].edge;
03272         int numFinalEdges = edgeSize - 1;
03273         int mapIndex = ccgDM_getEdgeMapIndex(ss, e);
03274         int x;
03275         int vertIdx[2];
03276         int edgeIdx = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeEdgeHandle(e));
03277 
03278         CCGVert *v;
03279         v = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert0(e);
03280         vertIdx[0] = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v));
03281         v = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeVert1(e);
03282         vertIdx[1] = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v));
03283 
03284         ccgdm->edgeMap[index].startVert = vertNum;
03285         ccgdm->edgeMap[index].startEdge = edgeNum;
03286 
03287         if (edgeIdx >= 0 && edgeFlags)
03288             edgeFlags[edgeIdx] = medge[edgeIdx].flag;
03289 
03290         /* set the edge base vert */
03291         *((int *)ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e)) = vertNum;
03292 
03293         for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
03294             float w[2];
03295             w[1] = (float) x / (edgeSize - 1);
03296             w[0] = 1 - w[1];
03297             DM_interp_vert_data(dm, &ccgdm->dm, vertIdx, w, 2, vertNum);
03298             if (vertOrigIndex) {
03299                 *vertOrigIndex = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
03300                 ++vertOrigIndex;
03301             }
03302             ++vertNum;
03303         }
03304 
03305         for (i = 0; i < numFinalEdges; ++i) {
03306             if (has_edge_origindex) {
03307                 *(int *)DM_get_edge_data(&ccgdm->dm, edgeNum + i, CD_ORIGINDEX) = mapIndex;
03308             }
03309         }
03310 
03311         edgeNum += numFinalEdges;
03312     }
03313 
03314     if (useSubsurfUv) {
03315         CustomData *ldata = &ccgdm->dm.loopData;
03316         CustomData *dmldata = &dm->loopData;
03317         int numlayer = CustomData_number_of_layers(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
03318         int dmnumlayer = CustomData_number_of_layers(dmldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
03319 
03320         for (i = 0; i < numlayer && i < dmnumlayer; i++)
03321             set_subsurf_uv(ss, dm, &ccgdm->dm, i);
03322     }
03323 
03324     for (index = 0; index < totvert; ++index) {
03325         CCGVert *v = ccgdm->vertMap[index].vert;
03326         int mapIndex = ccgDM_getVertMapIndex(ccgdm->ss, v);
03327         int vertIdx;
03328 
03329         vertIdx = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v));
03330 
03331         ccgdm->vertMap[index].startVert = vertNum;
03332 
03333         /* set the vert base vert */
03334         *((int *) ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v)) = vertNum;
03335 
03336         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, &ccgdm->dm, vertIdx, vertNum, 1);
03337 
03338         if (vertOrigIndex) {
03339             *vertOrigIndex = mapIndex;
03340             ++vertOrigIndex;
03341         }
03342         ++vertNum;
03343     }
03344 
03345     ccgdm->dm.numVertData = vertNum;
03346     ccgdm->dm.numEdgeData = edgeNum;
03347     ccgdm->dm.numTessFaceData = faceNum;
03348     ccgdm->dm.numLoopData = loopindex2;
03349     ccgdm->dm.numPolyData = faceNum;
03350 
03351     /* All tessellated CD layers were updated! */
03352     ccgdm->dm.dirty &= ~DM_DIRTY_TESS_CDLAYERS;
03353 
03354     BLI_array_free(vertidx);
03355     BLI_array_free(loopidx);
03356     free_ss_weights(&wtable);
03357 
03358     return ccgdm;
03359 }
03360 
03361 /***/
03362 
03363 struct DerivedMesh *subsurf_make_derived_from_derived(
03364         struct DerivedMesh *dm,
03365         struct SubsurfModifierData *smd,
03366         int useRenderParams, float (*vertCos)[3],
03367         int isFinalCalc, int forEditMode, int inEditMode)
03368 {
03369     int useSimple = smd->subdivType == ME_SIMPLE_SUBSURF;
03370     CCGFlags useAging = smd->flags & eSubsurfModifierFlag_DebugIncr ? CCG_USE_AGING : 0;
03371     int useSubsurfUv = smd->flags & eSubsurfModifierFlag_SubsurfUv;
03372     int drawInteriorEdges = !(smd->flags & eSubsurfModifierFlag_ControlEdges);
03373     CCGDerivedMesh *result;
03374 
03375     if (forEditMode) {
03376         int levels = (smd->modifier.scene) ? get_render_subsurf_level(&smd->modifier.scene->r, smd->levels) : smd->levels;
03377 
03378         smd->emCache = _getSubSurf(smd->emCache, levels, useAging | CCG_CALC_NORMALS);
03379         ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(smd->emCache, dm, vertCos, useSimple);
03380 
03381         result = getCCGDerivedMesh(smd->emCache,
03382                                    drawInteriorEdges,
03383                                    useSubsurfUv, dm);
03384     }
03385     else if (useRenderParams) {
03386         /* Do not use cache in render mode. */
03387         CCGSubSurf *ss;
03388         int levels = (smd->modifier.scene) ? get_render_subsurf_level(&smd->modifier.scene->r, smd->renderLevels) : smd->renderLevels;
03389 
03390         if (levels == 0)
03391             return dm;
03392         
03393         ss = _getSubSurf(NULL, levels, CCG_USE_ARENA | CCG_CALC_NORMALS);
03394 
03395         ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(ss, dm, vertCos, useSimple);
03396 
03397         result = getCCGDerivedMesh(ss,
03398                                    drawInteriorEdges, useSubsurfUv, dm);
03399 
03400         result->freeSS = 1;
03401     }
03402     else {
03403         int useIncremental = (smd->flags & eSubsurfModifierFlag_Incremental);
03404         int levels = (smd->modifier.scene) ? get_render_subsurf_level(&smd->modifier.scene->r, smd->levels) : smd->levels;
03405         CCGSubSurf *ss;
03406 
03407         /* It is quite possible there is a much better place to do this. It
03408          * depends a bit on how rigorously we expect this function to never
03409          * be called in editmode. In semi-theory we could share a single
03410          * cache, but the handles used inside and outside editmode are not
03411          * the same so we would need some way of converting them. Its probably
03412          * not worth the effort. But then why am I even writing this long
03413          * comment that no one will read? Hmmm. - zr
03414          *
03415          * Addendum: we can't really ensure that this is never called in edit
03416          * mode, so now we have a parameter to verify it. - brecht
03417          */
03418         if (!inEditMode && smd->emCache) {
03419             ccgSubSurf_free(smd->emCache);
03420             smd->emCache = NULL;
03421         }
03422 
03423         if (useIncremental && isFinalCalc) {
03424             smd->mCache = ss = _getSubSurf(smd->mCache, levels, useAging | CCG_CALC_NORMALS);
03425 
03426             ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(ss, dm, vertCos, useSimple);
03427 
03428             result = getCCGDerivedMesh(smd->mCache,
03429                                        drawInteriorEdges,
03430                                        useSubsurfUv, dm);
03431         }
03432         else {
03433             if (smd->mCache && isFinalCalc) {
03434                 ccgSubSurf_free(smd->mCache);
03435                 smd->mCache = NULL;
03436             }
03437 
03438             ss = _getSubSurf(NULL, levels, CCG_USE_ARENA | CCG_CALC_NORMALS);
03439             ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(ss, dm, vertCos, useSimple);
03440 
03441             result = getCCGDerivedMesh(ss, drawInteriorEdges, useSubsurfUv, dm);
03442 
03443             if (isFinalCalc)
03444                 smd->mCache = ss;
03445             else
03446                 result->freeSS = 1;
03447         }
03448     }
03449 
03450     return (DerivedMesh *)result;
03451 }
03452 
03453 void subsurf_calculate_limit_positions(Mesh *me, float (*positions_r)[3]) 
03454 {
03455     /* Finds the subsurf limit positions for the verts in a mesh 
03456      * and puts them in an array of floats. Please note that the 
03457      * calculated vert positions is incorrect for the verts 
03458      * on the boundary of the mesh.
03459      */
03460     CCGSubSurf *ss = _getSubSurf(NULL, 1, CCG_USE_ARENA);
03461     float edge_sum[3], face_sum[3];
03462     CCGVertIterator *vi;
03463     DerivedMesh *dm = CDDM_from_mesh(me, NULL);
03464 
03465     ss_sync_from_derivedmesh(ss, dm, NULL, 0);
03466 
03467     vi = ccgSubSurf_getVertIterator(ss);
03468     for (; !ccgVertIterator_isStopped(vi); ccgVertIterator_next(vi)) {
03469         CCGVert *v = ccgVertIterator_getCurrent(vi);
03470         int idx = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(v));
03471         int N = ccgSubSurf_getVertNumEdges(v);
03472         int numFaces = ccgSubSurf_getVertNumFaces(v);
03473         float *co;
03474         int i;
03475 
03476         edge_sum[0] = edge_sum[1] = edge_sum[2] = 0.0;
03477         face_sum[0] = face_sum[1] = face_sum[2] = 0.0;
03478 
03479         for (i = 0; i < N; i++) {
03480             CCGEdge *e = ccgSubSurf_getVertEdge(v, i);
03481             add_v3_v3v3(edge_sum, edge_sum, ccgSubSurf_getEdgeData(ss, e, 1));
03482         }
03483         for (i = 0; i < numFaces; i++) {
03484             CCGFace *f = ccgSubSurf_getVertFace(v, i);
03485             add_v3_v3(face_sum, ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(f));
03486         }
03487 
03488         /* ad-hoc correction for boundary vertices, to at least avoid them
03489          * moving completely out of place (brecht) */
03490         if (numFaces && numFaces != N)
03491             mul_v3_fl(face_sum, (float)N / (float)numFaces);
03492 
03493         co = ccgSubSurf_getVertData(ss, v);
03494         positions_r[idx][0] = (co[0] * N * N + edge_sum[0] * 4 + face_sum[0]) / (N * (N + 5));
03495         positions_r[idx][1] = (co[1] * N * N + edge_sum[1] * 4 + face_sum[1]) / (N * (N + 5));
03496         positions_r[idx][2] = (co[2] * N * N + edge_sum[2] * 4 + face_sum[2]) / (N * (N + 5));
03497     }
03498     ccgVertIterator_free(vi);
03499 
03500     ccgSubSurf_free(ss);
03501 
03502     dm->release(dm);
03503 }
